Eric knew this would be hard for her to believe, and he didn't even have the ring to prove it to her. He'd have to get her to trust him somehow. Naturally she should trust her boyfriend, but what he weas about to tell her was completely off the wall…

"Ok so just bear with me. You're not going to believe this but… yesterday James found this… thing. It's basically a ring of some kind that fell from space or I don't know where it came from. There was a big storm and there was a flash of light and he found it in the crater in the park." Eric paused to see if she was already lost.

Kim stared blankly at him, and put her hand over her face, "A ring from space… ok? Pleeeeease tell me this isn't another one of your dorky roleplaying games?"

"No I'm serious, this really happened in real life! Just forget about how stupid it sounds. Alright so look. The ring told James it had some kind of magic power, that it could swap bodies around or some bullshit, I didn't believe him either. Then he tried it on me, and it didn't work. So we figured it was just a joke, and he gave it to Audrey."

He continued, "So today I go over there and there's this little girl that answers the door that looks just like James, but she's completely girly and 13 years old. And I see his little sister Audrey there and I swear to god she's like the same age as you and me. The little girl answered to 'Jamie' and Audrey says she completely changed James into a little girl, and stole his age. Now Audrey's the big sister…"

Kim stared at him for a second and then closed her eyes and flopped back on the bed, with her arms flailing out to each side. "Eric! What the fuck are you talking about?!" She yelled.

"Trust me! It's all true! I don't know what Audrey did but I know she used the ring, and she tried to change me too. I got out of there just in time." He insisted.

Kim knew that Eric was not the type of guy to believe in the supernatural, he didn't even like science fiction or the other dorky stuff that James was into. So if Eric was so sure of himself, then maybe he was telling the truth?

"Ok so what if this is really true? What then? What the hell am I supposed to do to help?"

"Well we've gotta get the ring back obviously. And I didn't want to do it alone, I needed a plan. And we need to get James back to normal somehow." Eric explained.

"So if we try to steal the ring wouldn't his sister just change us like she changed James? I mean… if this is for real of course." Kim asked.

Eric thought for a second. "Well… You've never met James's sister before right? Audrey has no idea you're my girlfriend. Right before I left she said now that she turned into an 18 year old she's going to college this year, so I assume that means she switched school roles with James. This means she's going to be taking James's classes most likely. If you can meet her at school and try to become friends with her, you could try and get close and find an opportunity to take the ring. Just act like she's a new student and you want to be friends with her. You're a popular girl so she will want to be on your good side if she wants to survive high school life."

"I suppose that could work… What about you? If she sees you she'll use this ring on you…" Kim asked, worried for his safety.

"I'll have to stay away from her at school, but I also want to try and track down James. He's probably going to her old middle school and I can't show up at his house or she'll be there for sure. If you can befriend her you can let me know when she's away from home so I can track down James."

Kim smiled, "Sounds like a plan!"

Kim still wasn't fully convinced any of this was real, but she trusted Eric enough to know that he was seriously worried about this, so she agreed to play along for now.
1251121.title: Eric and Kim come up with a plan

choices: Kim meets up with Audrey at lunch, and they get to know each other.
Kim witnesses Audrey acting strangely, Eric might be right.
12511211.content:
After Eric's dramatic explanation of this so-called magic ring, Kim was still extremely hesitant to believe any of it. But since he was so insistent, she figured that she should at least help him along. After all, Eric was her boyfriend, and his word carried a lot of weight. They'd been dating for several months now, and she was starting to think this could be a long term thing. But with all this talk of magic and other things, Kim wondered what she was getting herself into…

The next day Kim drove to school, making sure to stay away from Eric. If what he said was true, they didn't want Audrey finding out who Kim was. Audrey seemed to have it out to anyone who knew James, and Kim had only met him a few times when he hung out with Eric.

As Kim entered the school, she was greeted by her girlfriends, Ella and Britney, who were excited to see her. Kim was very well known around the school as being the star volleyball player and for being members of just about every other after school club she could find time for. She was the type of girl everyone expected to have run for student president, but she decided her work load was too much, and didn't bother trying. If she had however, she would likely have been one of the most popular candidates.

Being this well-known had its advantages, as she had connections all over the place. She decided to see if she could find Audrey and invite her into her circle of friends.

"Hey Ella, did you hear about a new girl transferring to the school today? I heard she's a cute redhead, just your type." Kim smiled, teasing Ella.

It was their secret that Ella had kissed a red headed girl at a party one time. It was on a dare but Kim and Brit were the only two who knew she actually liked it. They didn't hesitate to tease her about being bi-curious from that day on.

Ella blushed, but nodded, "Um… Yeah actually I heard her name's Audrey. She already made waves in first period by showing up and humiliating the teacher somehow. I only heard through the grapevine, but they say she's got quite an attitude."Ella was Kim's eyes and ears throughout the school. She heard everything that went on through her network of friends that texted her every little juicy detail. Kim smiled, "Interesting… so maybe he was onto something." Kim mumbled to herself.

"Sorry?"

"Oh nothing. Good work Ella. What kind of attitude did she have? Is she a troublemaker? I'd like to meet her…" Kim made clear.

"Well they say she's quite pretty, and likes making fools of guys who hit on her. She seems very headstrong but is staying out of trouble for the most part." Ella informed.

Brit finally interjected, "Wait… Kim you're not actually thinking of making friends with this new girl? She sounds like a bitch, I wouldn't bother. You're just giving her the attention she wants if you do anything but ignore her."

"Oh Brit, don't worry about it. I just want to see what she's like. If she's cool, then maybe she can be our friend. She's new so she probably doesn't know anyone yet. If we get to her first, she could be on our side." Kim said with a pleasant smile, reassuring Britney.
12511211.title: Follow Kim to school the next day, meeting 18 y...

choices: Kim decides to use her gossip network to listen for anything weird.
125112111.content:
At lunch Kim and Ella looked around for Audrey. They found her leaving the lunch line and headed over to invite her to sit with them.
------------------------------------------------------------
Audrey had just gotten her lunch and was looking for a place to sit when she spotted two girls heading her way. One was tall and athletic looking with blonde hair in a pony tail and wearing sneakers, shorts and a tank top. The other was a bit shorter with long brown hair and wearing 4 inch heels and a dress. Audrey had been playing with the TSAR a little throughout the day and decided it would be fun to change a few things about these two...
------------------------------------------------------------
As Kim led Ella over to the new girl, she couldn't help checking her out. Audrey was short, with long auburn hair and quite pretty. She blushed a little as she remembered Ella And Brit teasing her about her attraction to readheads. She still hadn't told her boyfriend Eric about that. Maybe he would like it if she let him watch her make-out with another girl...

Kim's daydreaming was interrupted by Ella as she greeted the new girl.

"Hi, I'm Ella and this is my friend Kim. We heard that you're new to the school and wanted to invite you to eat lunch with us."

Audrey smiled and said "Thanks, I was hoping someone could introduce me to people."

As they sat down at their usual table Ella introduced Audrey to Brit and the rest of their friends and explained that she was the star volleyball player, a member of several after-school clubs and that she was planning on going to college for an engineering degree. Kim sat with her legs crossed, one of her heels hanging off her toes and toyed with her dress under the table. She was always impressed with Ella and wondered how she managed to handle so much. Kim was glad she was only the head cheerleader, and was planning to become a fashion designer. It gave her a lot more time with Eric.

As they talked, Kim decided Audrey seemed nice enough, but then she noticed Audrey playing with a strange looking ring on her finger. She brushed her long blonde hair behind her ear and wondered how she could find out more about the ring without making Audrey suspicious...

(Author's note: I apologize if this chapter is rough, this is my first time actually writing anything. I liked this story path and hope people will continue any of the paths where Audrey abuses the TSAR.)
125112111.title: Kim meets up with Audrey at lunch, and they get...

1251121112.content:
They chatted for a little while and then Ella said that she had to get to volleyball practice.

"When did you join the volleyball team," Brit asked.

"I've been on the team in like forever," Ella told her.

"You have?"

"Yeah, I'm the star player. You know that."

"You're the star. Yeah, right."

"I don't know what's gotten into you. Kim I'm like the best player right?"

"Yes you are the best. I watch you every week while I'm cheerleading," Kim confirmed.

"OK, I get it. You are playing a joke on me. HAR HAR HAR," Brit said sarcastically.

Both Kim and Ella knew who had which skill, but no one else did. Audrey hadn't changed the memory of anyone else. The TSAR was capable of swapping everyone memories about Ella and Kim, but Audrey didn't think to do that. Audrey watched the exchange and was actually pleased. Ella had all the memories and skills to be the star volleyball player but the team probably wouldn't let the cheerleader (as they thought) play. Kim would probably have just as difficult time when she showed up for cheerleading practice.

Regardless, Kim didn't think there was anything strange about Audrey. She seemed nice enough but she would check with her contacts when she could.

Audrey on the other hand thought it was fun to screw with people. She decided to trail Ella to the gym to see the teams reaction to Ella saying she was on the team.
1251121112.title: Reader's Choice.

choices: They confront Audrey about what she's laughing about.
They ignore the giggling, and give Ella a shot in Kim's place, surprisingly.
12511211121.content:
Audrey had no idea she had messed up on the swap, and was about to find out for herself. She followed Ella into the girl's locker room after class that day, curious to see how her ring managed to swap everything.

Ella confidently walked into the locker room, dressed in shorts and sneakers and her brown hair in a sporty ponytail. She was clearly dressed for practice, but was confused to see what she thought was her team standing around waiting for someone. She cheerfully waved to everyone like she was there every day and knew all of them by name.

"Hey! Sorry I'm late, were you all waiting for me? We should be practicing!" Ella announced to the volleyball team.

There were blank stares and the team looked to eachother whispering things to eachother. Then one of the girls, Carrie stepped forward with her hand on her hip, staring Ella down. "What is this Ella? Are you here to mock us or something? You're dressed like you're part of the team, did you steal Kim's uniform? We all know you prefer cheerleading."

Ella's ego is suddenly deflated and she has no idea what Carrie is talking about, "What? No I'm here to practice, I've never been a cheerleader! That's Kim's thing."

That was when the volleyball coach stepped out of her office, a tall, slightly overweight woman in her forties. "Where the hell is Kim, she's the captain it's her damn job to be here on time. If she's not here, we're starting without her, captain or not."

Carrie replied with a slight laugh, "The cheerleader seems to think she has what it takes to replace Kim, she even dressed up like her!"

Before the coach had time to respond, Audrey could barely be heard giggling to herself several rows down the locker room. It was free for other girls to be there, but they were rarely in there after hours.
12511211121.title: At volleyball practice

choices: Basketball team members receives painted nails
125112111211.content:
The girls see Audrey laughing and decided to come up and find out what she was all about.

"Well, what do you have to say for yourself?"

"About what?"

"About your laughing."

"Oh, I was on the phone it wasn't directed towards you."

"Then what are you doing here?"

"You see I am new at the school and I have always loved volleyball. I wanted to meet the team." Audrey went on to flatter the team and soon they were eating out of her hand.

Kelly Nava was eating all this up and brought Audrey down to meet the team.

"What is your name?"

"I'm Kelly Nava." she said. "Nice to meet you Kelly." Kelly then went to introduce Audrey to the team one at a time. Kelly introduced Audrey to a girl who was a couple inches taller than Kelly with darker hair. Audrey said, "I'm Audrey Bennett, what is your name." Before the new girl could answer, Audrey swapped the new girl's name with Kelly.

The new girl introduced herself, "I'm Kelly Nava."

Audrey then replied "Nice to meet you Kelly."

Audrey was then introduced to another girl. Audrey again swapped her name so once again Audrey heard, "Hi, I'm Kelly Nava."

Audrey then replied again "Nice to meet you Kelly." One by one, Audrey was introduced to each member of the team. All had their names switched to Kelly Nava. giving the former their old name and then receiving another name when the next girl was introduced. Audrey never learned any of the girls names. She just liked hearing them all calling themselves 'Kelly Nava.'

Soon practice was over and the men's basketball team entered the gym.
125112111211.title: They confront Audrey about what she's laugh...

choices: Continue changing the names of the whole team
1251121112111.content:
As most of the basketball girls filtered out with their new names, Audrey was thoroughly enjoying her experience with the ring so far. It was next time for the men's basketball team to start their practice, and with that came a whole new set of opportunities for Audrey to relish.

The team was coming off of a rough season last year, being one of the laughing stocks of their conference and posting the worst record in team history. To add insult to injury, the bleachers were completely empty, save for Audrey waiting for her moment to strike. The guys had noticed their lone fan after a few minutes warming up, and the team captains decided to take some time to thank the new girl for giving their lackluster squad a chance.

Justin Thompson and Richard Morris were among the top jocks of the school despite their team's terrible record, but despite this wanted to show some gratitude to Audrey for showing up and cheering them on. But Audrey had other plans, and noticing two volleyball girls still chatting near the gym door she completed the familiar name swap just before the guys opened their mouths.

"Hi, I just noticed you watching our practice", the first captain started. "The name's Ashley Nelson, and my co-captain over here is Tina Rodriguez". Both of the guys shook Audrey's hand with their new female names sounding completely normal to them. Audrey held back a laugh, and thanked the two for introducing themselves. "Ashley" and "Tina" returned to their practice, while the new Justin and Richard left the gym with their long ponytails swishing back and forth.

By this point it was clear that Audrey was no longer respecting anyone around her, but her desire to change more people was only growing with each swap. She contemplated what to do next as the team played on.
1251121112111.title: Hi, my name is

choices: Why should the coach join the fun?
Ella talks to Audrey after practice
12511211121112.content:
Audrey wanted to swap the rest of the teams names with girl's names, but there were only two girls left in the gym, so Audrey picked two boys at random and swapped their hair with the former Ashley and Tina's hair. This was so much fun, that the shortest two boys of the basketball team received the girl's legs (both of whom had painted toes on their smaller feet. The next pair received the former Tina and Ashley's general muscle tone. The next pair of boys received the girl's narrow waist and broad hips and backside. The next pair received the girl's boobs and the final pair received the girl's genitals.

When Tina and Ashley left the gym minutes later their whole body and their names had been swapped with boys. The only thing that hadn't changed were their pretty faces. The rest of their bodies had been distributed to the basketball team. None of the members of the team could detect that anything had happened. Only the new Tina and Ashley's game hadn't suffered to some degree.

What happens next?
12511211121112.title: Make some other changes

choices: Eric realizes that Kim's been swapped and tries to track down Audrey.
Eric is too distracted by Kim's new looks to notice her saying anything odd.
12511211122.content:
After school, the girls all went their separate ways, with Ella going to what she thought was her volleyball practice. Kim now believed she had nothing better to do today, with no cheer practice until tomorrow, she excitedly met up with her boyfriend Eric.

---

Eric was just leaving school, worrying about Audrey with the ring, and whether Kim was able to learn anything, when suddenly he saw a beautiful girl hurrying towards him. It wasn't until she was closer did he realize this was Kim! He double taked at the fact that she was wearing heels and a fashionable dress, not to mention her hair was down and she was wearing more makeup than usual.

"What, Kim? Wow you look incredible today, what's the occasion?" Eric asked with a smile as his girlfriend practically leapt into his arms. He thought maybe she was just feeling extra girly today, and wanted to compliment her. He had no reason to suspect she'd had her entire style and school life swapped with her best friend Ella.

Kim beamed at Eric and gave him a deep kiss, loving the attention he was giving her. "I uh... well you know I like dressing like this! I have an image to uphold anyways!"

Eric looked at her suspiciously for a second and then smiled. "You certainly do, I just can't believe I'm dating someone that looks this good. I guess this means your volleyball practice was cancelled, otherwise you'd be in your uniform?"

Kim seemed to shrug it off, "Oh no, I don't need to be in uniform until tomorrow, but Ella's practice was today. Don't worry about her, I'll cheer for her at her game next week. You're coming right?"
12511211122.title: Eric meets up with Kim

choices: Eric runs into other people who have been changed by Audrey
Kim tells Eric she wanted to stay this way
125112111221.content:
"Kim, Eric said somberly. "I'm afraid you have been swapped with someone."

Kim looked down at her body. "Everything looks the same to me."

"It's not your body. But even if it was you couldn't tell."

"If it's not my body? Then what?"

"I don't know, your likes, your interests, your personality, something like that. You aren't acting the same."

"I'm not?"

"No."

"How should I act?"

"Well you are a jock."

"I'm a guy?"

"No, I mean you like sports and are very good at it."

"I'm athletic. I'm a cheerleader you know. Cheerleading is s sport. But I wouldn't call myself a jock."

"You were a volleyball superstar."

"No that was Ella. She's the superstar."

"It should be you. Ella is a girly girl who loves cheerleading."

"Ella a girly girl??? I don't believe it." Kim imaged Ella of all people being a girly girl. Kim couldn't remember the last time she saw Ella in a dress. She always had her hair in that ponytail. Although Kim thought that with a little fashion tips, Ella could be quite pretty. Kim smiled at the thought. Then it occurred to her. Eric was saying that she was a jock like Ella. She didn't like it. She liked being a girl. What use is there in being a girl if you don't wear pretty clothes. Kim loved Ella to death, but she acts a bit too masculine.

"Yes, she and you must have swapped personalities." Eric hadn't talked to Ella but he assumed that Ella and Kim had swapped personalities or something.

"I was like her?"

"Yes and I'm sorry this happened to you. I'll have to find Audrey and get everything back to normal." Eric started to look for Audrey who was in the gym watching practice. Eric didn't know exactly what to do. He really couldn't force Audrey to change people back.

Kim like who she was now. She like Ella, but she didn't want to be like Ella. Ella is a wonderful person but it's better to be a cheerleader than an 'sports star.' Even if you were going to be a sports star, you could be fashion conscious off the court.

What happened next?
125112111221.title: Eric realizes that Kim's been swapped and t...

choices: Kim decides she doesn't believe Eric
12511212.content:
Eric phoned Kim to remind her. Kim said she would do it but asked what did Audrey look like.

"I hadn't thought of that. Look she should be in James' old classes, his second class is Living Environment with Mr. Conti. You can look for her there."

"What does she look like."

"like James, its his sister. You'll recognize her."

"No really." Eric then told her what she looked like. They got off the phone and Eric went through his day trying to avoid Audrey. When the day was over, he went to the local middle school. Eric was a senior and had a light course load so he got out in plenty of time to catch James.

But when he got there, he couldn't find James or Jamie anywhere. He waited for all the students to leave. While waiting he saw something weird. One of the 'students' caught his eye. At first he thought she was a teacher or something, she was in her thirties and she wore a nun's habit, but the way she interacted with the other students she was definitely treated like a kid, not an adult. When her 'mother' came and took her my the hand and scolded her for not coming one right after class (which included two hard smacks on the woman's bottom) Eric knew that Audrey had made another switch. If the nun was here, that must mean that Jamie was going to the local parochial school. He wasn't sure but it was a good place to start. Eric wondered if James was now a nun.

When everyone let out and Eric was sure Jamie wasn't there he returned to Kim's house to see how it was going.

"well did you find her?" Kim inquired.

"No, but I have a lead. How was it at your end?"

"Oh, it was great. Audrey is so cool. Everyone knows her and she knows everyone. But she spent time with me. You know she is on the volleyball team and is one of the best players there."

"She's on the team with you?"

"Me on a sports team? You are nuts. Look at these arms, do they look like I could do anything more physical than brushing my hair?"

"Oh my god, I am so sorry, she did this to you!"

"She did what?"

"She stole your athletic ability."

"My athletic ability? I have never been good at sports."

"You used to be." Then Eric took a good look at Kim's room, it was mostly the same although all of Kim's trophies and other sports stuff was gone. Eric felt horrible."

What happens next?
12511212.title: Follow Eric as he searches for Jamie at Audrey&...

choices: Jamie agrees to stay a little girl
Audrey makes Jamie a man again but leaves all other changes intact
125112121.content:
"I'm sorry, I'm so very sorry." Eric said with true emotion in his voice.

"Sorry for what?"

"She did this to you. You used to be a great athlete."

"No, I wasn't."

"Yes you were, you have to believe me."

It took some convincing but Eric did get Kim to believe somewhat what he said was true although she had no memory of ever playing sports. "We'll continue with the plan then."

"No way, I can't be responsible if things get worse for you."

"But she trusts me now." Now it was Kim's turn to convince Eric to continue with the plan. Her main point was if they didn't she would never get her athletic ability back which she didn't actually remember having.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Meanwhile, Audrey arrived home from school. She got home late since she was trying out for the volleyball team. Audrey knew the team was one member short now and she had the ability to fill that vacancy.

When she got home she was greeted by Jamie. Jamie was always happy to see her big sister. Jamie was still wearing her school uniform except she had taken off her maryjane shoes and was walking around in her stocking feet (technically navy colored knee socks.)

Jamie was now a very sweet little girl. Attending Catholic school had improved her manners. Audrey started her homework on the diningroom table. Jamie decided to join her also doing her homework. When Audrey was done she addressed Jamie, "Hey, would you like to learn how to wear makeup?"

"They don't allow us to wear makeup at school," the good girl in Jamie reminded both Audrey and herself..

"Your not at school. All girls wear makeup. C'mon, I"ll teach you."

Jamie didn't need much coaxing she was dying to try on makeup, but her mom never taught her and the school said she was too young. But if Audrey thought it was OK, that was fine with her.

Soon the two were in the bathroom and Audrey was teaching Jamie the basics of putting on makeup. Audrey had acquired her advanced makeup knowledge from a girl she saw in the bathroom of the high school. There was a lot to teach, but Audrey was only going to teach Jamie the basics. Audrey would show her what to do by doing to herself and then she would show Jamie in the mirror. Finally Audrey would wash off the makeup and have Jamie try it herself.

While trying on the makeup, Jamie made mistakes and after one really bad one, she said, "OH SHIT."

"Is that anyway for a young lady to talk?" Audrey chided.

"No, I'll try and do better."

"I'll help you," Audrey thought and removed all knowledge of bad words out of Jamie's head. It was as if she hadn't had them at all. She didn't even know the word piss, the she could do was say go potty or make a doody.. Everything else was totally gone from her mind.

While this was going on, Audrey wondered, what would James think if he saw what 'in effect' he was doing and had become. It was fun having a cute little sister around. Jamie seemed to be a happy girl, but Audrey didn't do this so that James could be happy, she didn't want him to be just a happy little girl that was no fun.

Then it occurred to her, James wasn't aware of what had happened to him, she could let him be aware. What would he do if he knew what had happened to him? She decided to let him be aware of who he was. She did that when Jamie was looking in the mirror after finishing up her last attempt at putting on makeup.

"OH MY... What have you done to me." Jamie screamed. If her knowledge of cussing was still intact she would have said, "Oh my god, that the fuck have you done to me, bitch." Well maybe not that vulgar but somewhere in between.

"My what do you mean JAMIE" Audrey emphasized James' new name.

"You made me into a little girl."

"I have?" Audrey said feigning ignorance.

"Yes you did, now turn me back."

"Turn you back? Into what?"

"A boy."

"You want to be a little boy?"

"No a man."

"You want to be a man?"

"Yes," Jamie said not thinking.

"But if your a man, then you can't go to school and be with your little friends."

Jamie hadn't thought of that. But she knew she was really a man and so she pressed on. "Well, I want to be me again."

"You are you. See yourself in the mirror." Jamie looked in the mirror, this was her face now, she just knew that she should be a man.

"You are very pretty. If you were a big man, then you can't wear pretty dresses."

Jamie did like wearing pretty dresses.

Continuing, "If you were a big man, you couldn't play with your barbies. If you were a big man, you couldn't go to Joanna's thirteenth birthday party Saturday.. There will be ice cream and cake and lots of games there."

"Men can go to birthday parties."

"Not to birthday parties for little girls."

"You can turn me back but let me go anyway."

"They will all think you are a..." Audrey wanted to say freak or pervert, but without her knowledge of cussing Jamie might not understand so she said, "strange man."

This made sense to Jamie. Jamie's mother had told her to stay away from strangers. Jamie was trapped, she had been so changed that he actually liked being a little girl. He knew she should be a man, but he didn't want to give up all that being a little girl entailed.

What happens next?
125112121.title: The plan continues

choices: Kim gets closer to gaining Audrey's trust about the ring.
1251121211.content:
Jamie thought about it for a while. She was not happy when she suddenly learned her whole life had been a lie. She realized that at one point she had been an older boy named James, and her sister had changed her. But that wasn't her now. She loved her sister more than anything, and couldn't really blame her for this. Jamie loved being a girl and getting to wear dresses, it was one of her most favorite things to do. If she made her sister change her back, she would lose all of her favorite things in the world. Her school friends, her dresses, her toys, everything.

"I don't want to be a strange man… I want to stay this way sis…" Jamie said, staring into the mirror at her 13 year old face.

Audrey was shocked, but then remembered all of the mental changes that were still in Jamie, and smiled. Jamie was aware of her past life, but was so much a girl now that she had no desire to ever change. That is until Jamie asked a question.

"But sis… you said if you change me back I will be a … strange man… for wearing dresses. But why can't I be the big sis again? Big sisters can still wear dresses and no one would call me strange." Jamie asked. Her logic was sound…

Audrey grinned, "If you're really good maybe I will let you be my age for a weekend, and I can show you what it's like."

--------------------------------

The next day, Audrey got to school and the first thing she did was head to the girl's locker room where the volleyball tryout results were posted. As expected, she had been picked as the replacement for Kim who was no longer on the team. Audrey had blown away the competition using the athletic skills she stole from Kim, and she was quickly becoming a rising star at her new school. She was grateful to have befriended Kim, who was going to be the key to Audrey's popularity. Kim was well liked, pretty, and had been very active and athletic until yesterday…

"Hey Audrey! You made it on the team huh?" Kim said as she approached.

"Yup! I can't believe I'm already on the varsity team on my second day of transferring to a new school! It's all thanks to you Kim. You've been so helpful showing me around and helping me meet new people." Audrey said excitedly.

Kim smiled nervously. "Yeah… No problem. I'm happy to help."

Kim was starting to think that maybe Eric was right. Audrey was definitely acting strange, like it was her first time ever trying out for a sports team. A girl with this much talent should have been playing volleyball for years already, but Audrey didn't act like that. And then there was the ring around Audrey's finger that she never was without. Eric's story all seemed to add up, but Kim had no idea what she could do about it.

If Audrey could truly swap things around and make Kim completely unaware, then how could she be sure Audrey hadn't taken more than just her athletic ability? Kim started to wonder if anything was real anymore. Was her auburn hair actually hers? Had she once been taller than 5'0"? All of these things seemed completely normal to Kim, but she had no way of knowing what Audrey had done to her, if anything at all.

Of course, Audrey did indeed now have Kim's fabulously blonde hair and 5'8" height. She even took Kim's athletic toned muscles for herself, leaving Kim skinny with no muscles to speak of. All of these things were helping Audrey excel as the new popular girl in school. One by one, Kim was forgetting about her friends, as Audrey stole her relationships from her. Every time Kim introduced a friend to Audrey, that friend became Audrey's friend, and it was as if they had never met Kim before today.

But Kim didn't know any of this. To her, Audrey was just incredibly popular and knew tons of people in the school, and Kim was just lucky enough to be friends with such a popular girl, having no friends herself. The only real friend she had left was Eric, who she knew she couldn't introduce to Audrey.
1251121211.title: Jamie agrees to stay a little girl

12511212113.content:
Kim was in the middle of a crisis. She cared deeply about Eric, and wanted to help him get the ring back, however was now filled with a general uneasiness towards the ring's true power. Nothing really felt wrong, but how was she to know what the ring had changed and what it hadn't? To remedy her growing problem, she decided to directly ask Audrey about the ring to see what she felt about it.

With a slight shakiness in her voice, Kim spoke up. "Hey Audrey, that's a beautiful ring. Where'd you get it from?

Audrey's face quickly shifted to a guarded expression. "A friend gave it to me. It is lovely, isn't it? Anyway, I have Calculus to get to, don't want to be late. I'll see ya later, okay Kim?"

"Sure thing Audrey, bye!", Kim replied. It was time for her to get to class anyway, and there would be time later in the day to figure out more about the mysterious ring. Kim headed off to her next class, checking her schedule to find her next class was Music Appreciation.

Unknown to Kim, Audrey had switched their academic interests, and by extension, their general intelligence. Audrey's previous knowledge was that of a 13-year old girl despite her outward 18-year old appearance, but now she possessed all of the necessary brainpower to take on Kim's rigorous Engineering degree. Kim now had no idea what she wanted to do in life, and didn't care much for complicated things like math or science. Right now Kim's major was undecided, and with five years of maturity lost it would be a while before she would be able to focus on any long term academic goals. Crucial items like graphing calculators and textbooks disappeared from her backpack, replaced by mostly empty notebooks littered with sketches and doodles.

Kim walked to class, throwing her straight auburn hair over her shoulder, wondering how Audrey could handle whatever derivatives were.

As class dragged on, Kim found it very difficult to focus. She could only stare at the clock, daydreaming of hanging out with Eric and occasionally brainstorming plans to find out more about the ring. Fifty long minutes later, she was free, with a few hours open before her next class, Public Speaking. Should she go try to find Audrey again and try to grab her ring? Or should she head home and spend time with Eric, and see if he's uncovered anything else?
12511212113.title: The Downward Spiral

13.content:
Eric was right, James hadn't seen his girlfriend in a while. Not for a proper date anyway, so he called her up and planned a date with her at their favorite Italian Restaurant. James loved this restaurant and took Lauren there many times. The food was good and the price was reasonable for his budget.

All the while that he was preparing for his date he debated whether to tell Lauren about the ring or not. He debated up until the second that he arrived at her door. He was let in by Lauren's parents and made to wait while she 'got ready.' James knew she was ready in plenty of time but she always made him wait. James thought it was some sort of conspiracy agreed upon by all women that they can never be ready to go when their date was at the door. This clinched it, he wouldn't tell her. But he wanted to try the ring out so badly.

Finally they got to the restaurant and sat down. Lauren was talking and normally James would say his piece too, but right now he had other things on his mind. He wanted to test the ring but he had to do so in a way that was unmistakable but was also slight so that if it didn't work he wouldn't make a fool out of himself. James was only half listening to what Lauren was saying preferring to look around at the people at the restaurant trying to come up with an idea of what to do.

Sitting at a table adjacent to Lauren and himself was a British couple. He could tell by their accents. Once he was made aware of them, the woman in particular drew his interest. She was quite very well endowed. Certainly much bigger than Lauren. James wondered what a man like that (the gentlemen she was with was tall but very thin with glasses and quite average looking, not in the league of the woman he was with) was doing with him. James decided to make a swap with them. But what, it had to be something small but unmistakeable. He couldn't swap Lauren's boobs with the boobs of the other woman, that couldn't be nice and what if she noticed, how would he explain it.

What he decided to do was swap their first names with the names of the couple. He'd use her name and see how she reacted. This was the perfect test. It was small, no one would notice and he could swap it back without causing a scene with anyone. He did it. He found his name was now Steven. This disappointed him, he was hoping he would end up with a nice British name like Clive or Nigel. James (now Steven) realized that he was now sitting with Liz instead of Lauren. But he had to find out so he broke into the conversation, "L-L-Liz, I have to go to the mensroom." He didn't have to do, but he had to find an excuse to use her name.

"Steven, sure go then." 'Liz' said naturally.

It had worked, he was now Steven (he knew his name should be James, but he knew it was Steven nevertheless.) He would quickly go to the restroom and return and try to say Liz as often as he could. This was so cool. 'Liz' had talked for a while now it was his turn.

131.content:
While in the bathroom, 'Steven' washed his hands, and kept looking at the ring on his finger. He realized this was only the tip of the ice berg, and if all the things the ring told him were true… this could be amazing! He saw his reflection, and it looked the same as always. He regretted not getting all dressed up for his date, but it wasn't like he owned a suit or anything. He had come to the Italian restaurant wearing jeans and sneakers, and a semi-decent button up shirt. It's fine though… not like Liz got dressed up either… He thought to himself, and realized he'd just thought of his girlfriend as Liz.

'Steven' started to get concerned, and realized that he was having some trouble recalling his own name. He just kept thinking Steven was his name every time he thought about it. He reached inside his wallet and found his driver's license which read: James Barrett. That's right… it was James. Strange how easy that is to forget now… I better remember to switch that back later…

When he was finally done in the bathroom, 'Steven' returned to the table, seeing his cute girlfriend waiting there, sipping some tea out of a straw. When he sat down he took a moment to admire her. She had a cute Korean face with straight black hair. The two of them had been a couple through most of high school, and knew each other quite intimately… But something in the back of his mind always wished she would be a little more… girly. She wasn't a tomboy, and her hair was very long, but her choice of clothing was a bit plain. She rarely wore makeup, though he thought she didn't need it to look cute.

She had come to the date wearing similarly plain clothes to him. She was wearing black jeans and a T-shirt with cute variations of certain game characters she liked, with a light jacket on over top of that. 'Steven' didn't mind her look, but he suddenly noticed the British couple again, and how much well-dressed they were. Sure they were adults in their early thirties most likely, but they dressed much better than the two teens. That Lauren lady… wait… no that's not Lauren, that's Liz's name… I mean Lauren's name… Shit whatever. That British lady is pretty attractive… I wonder if this thing can swap outfits? Too bad about the tits though, everyone would notice Liz… I mean Lauren, with giant knockers like that.

With a simple thought, 'Steven' thought about swapping Liz and Lauren's current outfits. He didn't really want to affect their whole wardrobe, but he was sure no one would care that Lauren was suddenly dressed nicer when she was going out with her boyfriend. If anything her parents would probably be glad that she finally put some effort into her appearance.

He looked across the table at his girlfriend, who was no longer wearing jeans and a T-shirt, but was wearing a black PVC dress that was resized to fit her petite body. If she had something larger than her B cup breasts, the dress might have shown off a lot of cleavage, and she didn't really have much of an ass to fill out the back of the dress either, but it compensated by being a smaller, more form fitting dress. The dress stopped mid-thigh, something much shorter than Lauren would normally wear, and if he looked under the table, he'd notice she was wearing a pair of leather boots that would boost her height by 4 inches when she stood up. He wondered how she would handle this, since his girlfriend was never the type to wear heels, despite her short stature.

He made sure to make Lauren and Liz unaware that this wasn't the outfit they both came to the restaurant in, and for good measure he made 'James' (originally Steven) also unaware of the change. Now the real Liz was wearing Lauren's old clothing, complete with the video game T-shirt that was re-sized for her tremendous bust size. He chuckled that she would likely have no idea who the characters on the shirt were, but in her mind she would remember owning this shirt for some reason.

The new 'Liz' was looking fantastic however, in her new black dress and boots, and she had even gained a few pieces of jewelry, a necklace and earrings, which actually looked quite good on her. To top it all off, James suddenly realized his girlfriend was also wearing makeup now, as it was part of the whole outfit swap. The tasteful makeup made her look way more attractive than her normal cute look. James was quite pleased with the results, and no one seemed aware. The only thing that happened was 'Liz' now wondered why 'Steven' was taking so long to eat.

"Steven, you don't like what you ordered? I haven't seen you eating much. Did you want some of my chicken? I'm not hungry enough to finish it anyways." The original Lauren asked.

"No thanks Liz… it's not bad I'm just a little distracted. You look gorgeous tonight by the way! I don't know if I mentioned it. You should wear dresses like that more often!" James complimented.

Lauren's pale Korean complexion went red as she blushed, "Thanks… this is the only one I have like this though. I kinda do like it actually. I wonder why I've never worn it before?"

1312.content:
'Steven' enjoyed the evening so far, but something was still bothering him. He couldn't just remember what it was exactly, well he would remember it eventually. 'Steven' and 'Liz' ordered their food and made some small talk while waiting for it. He knew he was somehow excited to call 'Liz' by her name, but it might be the excitement of knowing how lucky he was having her as his girlfriend.

The waitress brought them their dinner. A pepperoni pizza for 'Liz' and spaghetti for 'Steven'. 'Steven' just loved spaghetti, it was only too bad that his mom never made it that often.

With a quick thought 'Steven' switched his name back with 'James' and 'Liz' with 'Laura' while taking a breath mint. He was wondering if the swap worked when he noticed Laura was talking to him. "James are you there? Your mind seemed to have wondered off."

"Oh nothing Laura, just thinking about something. What did you say?" James asked. It worked, I'm James and she's Laura again.

"I said I couldn't take a bite more, do you want it?" Laura said shoving her plate over to James. It didn't take long for James to finish it as well.

"Weird isn't it?" Laura suddenly asked.

"That British couple that just left the restaurant, that lady was wearing a shirt with video game characters on it. Kinda weird isn't it for a woman that age to wear something like that." Laura said.

"Yeah I think so too. Wait a sec they left?!" James asked surprised. James peered through the window and saw how the couple stepped inside a cab and rode away.

What have I done? That lady just went off with Laura's clothes, Laura won't be too happy if she finds out. James thought.

"James, is something troubling you?" Laura asked concerned. "You've been acting weird this whole evening."

I don't have Netflix on my TV."

James was too busy thinking about what happened to his relationship with Lauren, that he simply rushed straight to his normal first period class. When he got there, he noticed his seat was taken, and the teacher was staring at James like he had a third eye on his forehead.

"Yes, can we help you Mr...?" The teacher asked as James stood in the doorway, looking for a place to sit.

"Uhh, it's James, sorry I'm a little late, is there any seats left?" He felt incredibly awkward with the whole class staring at him, and realized that every single desk was taken...

"Mr. James. Huh. Are you sure you're in the right class? This is Calculus."

"Yeah, I've been taking Calculus all semester, I... Wait, what class should I be in then?" James was suddenly confused for a moment, as conflicting memories appeared in his head. He was sure he was in Calculus... wasn't he?

The class started to chuckle at James, some of them probably thought he was too high to remember what class he was in. But finally one of the student's spoke up. "Hey, aren't you in my brother's Pre-Calc class? It's right next door I see you over there a lot."

"Pre-calc... shit that must be it. Sorry!" James sighed, wondering if he was just losing it, or if the TSAR had somehow changed his class. He couldn't trust his memories anymore it seemed.

"Language!" The teacher scolded, as James left to the room next door in a hurry.

----------------------------

In the Pre-calc classroom, James spotted an empty desk that he realized must be his, and quietly snuck in. But the teacher was more perceptive than he thought. She had her back turned to the board the whole time, but somehow must have heard him…

"Late again James? You know that's your third strike, see me after class." The teacher said coldly, before resuming the lesson. "Turn to page 147, if you even have your book."

He hurriedly opened his backpack and pulled out the first book he saw which sure enough… was a Pre-Calculus book. He realized something must have definitely changed, because he distinctly remembered packing a Calculus book that morning. And he'd never seen this teacher in his life, but clearly she knew his name.

If the swap's already made me 17 years old, then I guess that makes me a Junior now. This is starting to make more sense… There was no way I'd be in Calculus in 11th grade, I'm not that advanced… So as I get younger, the stupid TSAR is making people treat me as though I always WAS that age. This could get really weird…

He looked at his watch again, 10 minutes left on his timer. He suspected that was about when he'd become 16 years old, and go down one more grade… James decided to kill time by trying to figure out what else was different. His body seemed, more or less the same, though he might have lost a pound or two around the waist. It was no big deal going from 18 to 17 apparently, since he had already gone through puberty by then.

He was about to start paying attention to the lesson when he heard the beeping of his watch.

"Someone better not be texting in my class!" The teacher exclaimed as she turned around, looking for what made the brief beep noise. "I hope it wasn't Ja-"

She was cut off by a sudden distortion of time and space, as James suddenly felt like he'd been punched in the gut. His vision swirled, and he felt like he wasn't even sitting anymore. Things around him were rearranging, and he had to close his eyes or he was afraid he might throw up from all the spinning.

155211211.content:
"James..James...James..." James heard his name being called. He opened his eyes and looked around. It was a classroom like any other, but it wasn't the same classroom. The teacher in front of him wasn't a woman, it was a man. Mr. Synder to be exact. James had had Mr. Synder in freshman English two years ago. The posters and work on the walls made it quite apparent that this wasn't a math class. Somehow the TSAR had physically moved him from one class to another without him moving. Looking at his desk, his book was opened and there was already notes written. He didn't remember writing the notes himself but they were in his own handwriting.

"James..." he heard again. James looked up and said, "Yes, Mr. Synder."

"Ah, you are with us. Can you tell us what is the significance of Ophelia's suicide?"

Ophelia's suicide? When James had Mr. Synder that was freshman English. He read Romeo and Juliet then. He didn't read Hamlet until his sophomore year. James realized that his classes were all messed up. He wasn't going back into his own past? These classes were different than the ones he took before. This made sense since, his teachers had a different schedule from year to year so it wasn't like he was going back two years into the past. he was still in this year, he simply was now two years younger and this must be the classes he would have had if he happened to be born two years later.

English wasn't his best class and he hadn't read Hamlet in the last two years. James wasn't even sure if Ophelia had committed suicide. He thought she had died in an accident. "Mr. Synder," he said, "Ophelia's death was an accident not a suicide." Then James went off to explain as best he could his position. James knew he didn't have anything to lose. He wasn't going to be in this class long enough to take a test or get a grade so it didn't matter what he said. But James showed that he had read the book in question and that was good enough for the teacher who moved the class forward.

The class went on as normal. James wasn't sure if he should continue to take notes. But he decided to treat the day as normal. Looking at his watch he determined that he would finish the class and get into the next class before regressing into the lower grade. When the class was over, James checked his schedule and found that his next class was Spanish. It wasn't his favorite class, but he should be a senior and knew Spanish much better now than he did two years before. Arriving at his class, he took a seat and then waited for his regression.

What happens next?
155211211.title: James is now 16.

choices: 14 years old, and time for middle school again.
14 years old, but something else happens.
1552112111.content:
After realizing that he wasn't following his own past as he aged down, James no longer knew what to expect anymore. He had some fears of what would come next, but mostly he actually was looking forward to seeing what was in store.

In his Spanish class, he found himself slacking off and unable to pay attention to the lesson. Of course, he already knew most of what was being taught, since he had this class before. At least, that's what he thought, until he noticed the teacher going over words and phrases that he'd never heard before. He thought maybe this teacher was just teaching some obscure nouns that James hadn't learned in his previous class. But as the lesson went on, more and more words started to seem foreign to him. Was the teacher ramping up the difficulty all of a sudden? No... the class seemed to be following along just fine. It was like... he was starting to unlearn the things he learned in this class when he originally took it.

Shit... I should have known. I guess that's a side effect of being younger, right? That must mean I'm continuously losing age as I go, not just once every half hour. He thought, as he looked at his watch. Only two minutes to go until the next jump down in grade. At that point he realized he was about to become a Freshman again, and relive those awkward years... luckily he knew it wouldn't last long.

"James, mi aerodeslizador está lleno de anguilas?" The teacher suddenly asked him. The whole class was looking at James suddenly.

"Uhh... I'm sorry I... What?" James was at a loss for what to say.

"Mi aerodeslizador está lleno de anguilas!"

"I really don't..."

The teacher sighed, "Miss Barrett... Sorry Mister Barrett, have you not been paying atten-"

Again, as if on cue, the teacher was interrupted by the entire room spinning out of control. James closed his eyes and wondered briefly why the teacher had mistakenly called him 'miss' at first, but the pain in his stomach reminded him exactly why. As he felt suspended in a swirling vortex between two realities, he remembered he still possessed female genitalia... And the accelerated, though backwards, time was hitting him especially hard in the uterus.

----------

When reality stopped spinning, James felt the disorientation fade, but the pain did not. He got bearings of his surroundings, and realized he wasn't sitting anymore, hell he wasn't even indoors anymore! He was on the track field, hunched over staring at the floor, while clutching his midsection. Boys were running past, many were laughing and making passing comments.

"Hah! Pussy can't handle it!" "The little twat can't even run!" Were among the things he heard by the boys running past.

When he looked up, even the slower kids who barely tried to run had already passed him, as he stood there in gut wrenching pain. He didn't understand, why was this happening? Before he could speculate, he noticed the coach standing over him, with his hands folded, looking pretty annoyed.

"Listen, I don't know, I never had this kind of shit when I was your age... Dudes with periods... it just ain't right. But the school district insisted that you 'identify' as a boy and you need to take boys gym class, so here you are. Making my life difficult."

James did his best to stand up straighter, and finally noticed just how tall this gym teacher was. Or rather, how much shorter James had gotten. He remembered this guy being about the same height as him before, but now James guessed he must be... at least 5 inches shorter than before. He felt a bit lighter as a result, but due to the pain in his ovaries, he really didn't give a shit at the moment.

"Look, sir, I'm sorry, it's not like I wanted this to happen... But please, can I at least go to the nurse?" James said, just trying to get the hell out of this class, and hopefully find somewhere to sit down and wait this year out. Turned out his freshman year in this reality was a bit different than he remembered...

"Yeah, sure, fine. Maybe they can get you some Vicodin or whatever, I don't know. Next time if you want to take a class with boys, make sure you actually are one, got it? I don't care what you look like on the outside, if you're bleedin down there, then you don't belong in this class. Get going to the nurse." The coach said with a nasty glare. James couldn't tell if he was just grumpy or just plain bigoted, but as long as he was free to go, he didn't care one bit.

As James walked off the track, he headed straight for the nurse, even though he knew any pain killers would never take effect quick enough before he became younger and left this all behind. For a moment he considered just handing this period off to someone else, and going back to being a male. But then he remembered... this was his girlfriend's equipment. If something were to happen with all the reality shifting, and he somehow lost Lauren's uterus in a weird space-time kerfuffle, he might not ever be able to put her back to normal again. No, he knew he just had to bear it. If this was what girls had to go through, then he could go through it too. It was only temporary, he knew. And within a few hours, he would be too young to even get periods, so he would be in the clear!

When he finally got to the nurse, she seemed to recognize James instantly, as though this was a common occurrence. "Oh Jimmy... it's that time of the month again? Haven't they got you on male hormones like we talked about?"

James stood there staring at her dumbfounded. "Male hormones?"

"Yeah...? You know, testosterone, and such? Your doctor still hasn't approved it yet? Once you start going on that treatment, the periods will stop, and you'll be able to fit in with the other boys easily. I know you're already going through puberty, but it's better to do this sooner than later." The nurse explained, very concisely infact.

James sat down, taking a rest. "Wait, this sounds like... Hang on, you're just a high school nurse, how do you know all this about transgender therapy?"

She shrugged, "I mean I'm not a complete idiot when it comes to medical things, but most of it I just looked up online, the internet is a wonderful tool. The students of this school are my patients, and that includes you. Since you're the first student I've had to deal with this particular situation... I had to do some research last time you came in for help."

He couldn't decide whether he wanted to hold his stomach or his head, which was now hurting as well, just from trying to think through all this crap that was going on all at once. He tried to piece together what the hell was happening to reality, why people were suddenly treating him like a female to male trans. He saw his reflection in the mirror, and definitely noted that his features were softer and less masculine than before, but he was also barely fifteen at this point, and still falling. But despite that, he didn't think he looked like a girl passing as a boy... he didn't even have a hint of breasts, or any sign that breasts were removed. But since James really had no idea how people like this transitioned, none of this information really stood out to him as odd, compared to all the other odd things happening. He just assumed the TSAR was slowly tying up loose ends, and fixing inconsistencies one step at a time.

"Look Jimmy, just have a lie down, and take these pain killers. Trust me, they will help." The nurse said with a smile, as she handed him two pills and a glass of water.

He knew it wouldn't matter, but he was in too much pain to care, and downed the pills without a second thought. As he held the glass up to his face, he caught side of the TSAR on his finger again. It still looked like a dark metallic ring, and he could have sworn it had shrunk to fit his younger fingers, but there was no way to be sure. Nevertheless, he toyed at the sliders in his boredom, and discovered they couldn't be moved. He had hoped maybe to speed things up, but once the TSAR was working its magic, there didn't seem to be any stopping it...

James looked at his watch... just a few seconds to go. Soon he'd leave high school entirely, if things proceeded as he thought. He shuddered to think what 8th grade must be like now, with the TSAR trying to adapt reality to the exceptionally strange situation he threw at it. No matter how convoluted, the TSAR was still diligently doing its job as designed.
1552112111.title: James at 15

choices: A teacher sees James in the hall.
15521121111.content:
A moment later and another time shift happened. James was no longer standing but sitting down in class. The pains he had were gone. Also even though there was no way for him to know it, but the pills that James had just took were also gone from his body. The class was obviously Spanish again, but it was a different class than before. The teacher was different. James had never seen this teacher before. She was young and had been hired to the school in the years since James had graduated from middle school. The room was different and the students were different too. One of the students was reading out loud from a text book in broken Spanish. James understood the student was saying. James did better in the earlier Spanish classes than he did when the work picked up in high school;.

Looking around the room he realized that he didn't know most of the kids here. He wasn't in the habit of speaking to middle schoolers. They all looked so young to him. They all were barely older than kids. James couldn't see what he looked like, he didn't have a mirror. Looking at himself he saw he was wearing pretty much the same things as before, he wore jeans and a t-shirt. But that was the standard outfit he had been wearing to school for as long as he dressed himself. He was wearing a Star Wars design on his t-shirt, but he had loved Star Wars for as long as he could remember so that was no big thing. He knew that he had shirts with a Star Wars design even when he was still eighteen. That was two hours ago. All school rooms looked alike so James didn't know that not only was in in a different room but he was also in a different building. He was now over three miles from where he had been just a few minutes before. James didn't know it, but in this new reality, Lauren hadn't driven him to school but James had taken the bus. If James was going to return home from his school, he would also return home in a school bus.

James hadn't thought that something like this could happen. In truth he hadn't thought about what getting younger would mean at all. He sort of thought he would get younger, but stay in high school. He also didn't consider what was happening to the boy who he was swapping ages with. At this point James and that boy were in the same grade. In another half and hour, James would be be in seventh grade and that boy would be back in high school. But James didn't worry about that. The other boy who was aging rapidly didn't even know anything was happening at all. He didn't even know that He had gone from grammar school to middle school and would soon be in high school.

James was curious as to what he looked like. He needed a mirror but there wasn't any way to get one. So he raised his hand and asked to go to the restroom. The teacher gave him permission and so he walked out of the class. Looking at the door he found he was in room 317. He wasn't sure which way was the restroom, he hadn't been at this school in four years. But all school really look the same. So he walked down the hall looking for the restroom. There wasn't one on this floor. He went down to the second floor to look, but there wasn't one for the students there either. It seems at this school all students had to use the restroom at the first floor. He found them. The boys and girls restroom were next to each other. But he didn't know which one to use.

What happens next?
15521121111.title: 14 years old, and time for middle school again.

choices: Go back to class to wait out the change to 13 years old.
Explore the school, and try not to get caught for 10 minutes.
155211211111.content:
James took another brief look down at himself, and saw no reason why he should go in the girl's room. So, quickly he headed into the boy's bathroom and finally caught a look at his reflection. His new age of 14 was definitely noticeable now: his face looking more youthful, and his skin being almost entirely smooth and hairless. He noted the Star Wars T-shirt actually wasn't a shirt he ever remembered having. While before he might have worn a shirt showing Darth Vader or Stormtroopers from the classic trilogy, he was now wearing a brand new T-shirt of Rey from the newest movie. Despite the fact she was a female protagonist, he shrugged it off, since Rey was a pretty cool character, he thought.

What was difficult for James to notice however, was how his height had continued to drop. In the middle school bathroom, he couldn't tell that he was now only 5'3" in height. He lifted his shirt up for a second, noticing his waist being thinner and less toned than before, as his weight had dropped down to a staggering 110 lbs. He felt light and energetic, like he should just run out of this bathroom just to kill the excess of energy. But he decided not to do that, and simply let his shirt fall back into place, and realized he suddenly actually did need to pee.

He turned around to see that the boy's bathroom had a single stall, and several urinals. And the stall was occupied... There was no way he could use a urinal with his female anatomy, so he had no choice but to wait. The kid was taking longer than he probably should have, and James wondered if middle-schoolers these days all had smartphones and this kid was in there texting or something. He decided to timidly knock on the door, letting them know someone was waiting.

"Hey... anyone in there?" James said, with a surprisingly different voice than he remembered. It was a little higher, and cracked as he started speaking. A sign that he was definitely descending through puberty all over again.

There was no response, but suddenly he heard a flush, and the door unlocked. A boy stepped out, a little taller than James was currently. Strangely enough, this kid was also wearing a Star Wars shirt, but his had a picture of Kylo Ren on the front.

The boy smirked, and James caught a glimpse of him slipping a phone back into his jeans pocket. "Hey, nice shirt, Jamie. You like Rey huh?" The boy asked, with a hint of tease in his voice.

James shrugged, not picking up on the sarcastic tone, "Yeah I guess, she's pretty kickass, don't you think?"

"Pssh, yeah right. Like a chick would ever be better than Kylo. Why don't you go back to the girl's bathroom where you belong, Jamie." The kid folded his arms, and stood there half-blocking James' way to the stall.

But something about this kid seemed familiar... James squinted and tried to think of why this boy might know him. "Wait a second, is your name Jacob?"

"Uhh, yeah, duh."

"I knew it, you're the kid that lives across the street from me." James pointed out, realizing this was the same kid he was swapping ages with... By chance, they just happened to both be 14 at the same time, which meant that the swap was about halfway done already.

"Wait, you're THAT Jamie? Isn't your sister the cute redhead?" Jacob asked, suddenly looking really embarrassed.

"My name's James, but yeah, that's my sister, Audrey. Why?"

"Look, just, I don't know, tell her I said hi or something... You can introduce me to her, can't you?" Jacob said, still blocking the way into the stall. James really had to pee now... like, his legs were locked together, trying desperately to hold it in.

"Introduce you... I... sure whatever man. You know she's only 13 right? Why would you want to be friends with her? You know what, never mind, just come over after school. Can I please use the bathroom now?" James said, not really caring about anything but peeing at this point.

Jacob finally stepped aside, "I'm holding you to that, today, after school, your house."

With Jacob gone, James practically flew into the stall and pulled his pants down. The plain white panties didn't faze him one bit as he sat down to get indescribable relief. It was only the second time he'd peed with girl parts, but it really didn't bother him. All he had to do was relax, and the rest came naturally to him.

James looked at his watch, surprised that so much time had passed, but he still had ten minutes left as a 14 year old. He pulled up his pants and washed his hands, wondering if he should just head back to class or kill time in the hallways. He was feeling rebellious, not caring if he got in trouble, since he'd be shifted in reality again anyways.
155211211111.title: James enters boys restroom

choices: Passing notes in the seventh grade
James in the seventh grade alternate version
1552112111112.content:
James didn't like Jacob. As a ten year old James didn't know much about him but now that they were both fourteen, he thought Jacob was an asshole. James certainly didn't want his sister dating him. James decided he wouldn't tell her when he got home. Then he remembered he didn't have to, By that time Jacob would be eighteen and not interested in a thirteen year old. When James swapped back with Jacob then Jacob would be a little kid and not want to hang out with girls of any age. Of course, he would still be an asshole. James thought that maybe after the change, he would swap something between Jacob and someone else to teach him a lesson. He didn't know what, but all that would have to wait until later. He couldn't risk swapping anything until James got his age back. He didn't know how that would effect things.

James was not only getting physically younger, he was also getting less mature as he decreased in age. James decided to look around the school. He hadn't been here in a while and didn't know his way around. he could look through the halls and see where the offices were. He could see who is in each class. What did it matter in a few minutes he would be in a new grade anyway.

He walked around the halls aimlessly without any purpose. When he passed an adult he would straighten up but mostly he loafed along. He would sometimes look into a random classroom to look around. he was looking in one such classroom when he felt a hand on his shoulder. When he turned around he saw an adult, presumably a teacher was grabbing him.

"What are you doing here, young man." the adult demanded.

James saw it was a man in his late thirties who had a hand on him. He was wearing a casual suit and tie that is common in schools. The man was in complete control over the situation. James was only a little middle schooler and this man towered over him. The man knew that James was up to no good. It was obvious. No student should be loitering in the halls.

"I was just on my way back to class," James said hesitantly.

"Oh were you now? What's your name."

"My name is James Barrett."

"What class are you in, James Barrett?" The man spat out his full name like an insult. The problem was that James wasn't sure what class he was in. He pretty much knew he was in the eighth grade, but what class he was in he wasn't sure. He couldn't say he had to look it up. Everyone knows what class they are in.

"I'm in room 323," James said. He wasn't sure if that was it. He only looked at it for a second when he left the room. The teacher knew something was wrong, but he wasn't sure what. Regardless the man decided to investigate. James was feeling trapped and he didn't have the maturity to ride it out. So when James saw a young girl who was in the sixth grade walk by, James used the TSAR for the first time since starting this slow-motion swap. He exchanged the girl's authority with the man's. Suddenly the man's resolved crumbled. James seemed so much more in control than he was. The roles had psychologically reversed. James was the older one in authority and the man was like a girl two years younger than James. With his resolve broken, hoping to just get out of there, the man said, "Hurry to class and don't let me see you in the halls again." Then the man hurried off to get away.

The little girl, didn't feel any different, but the next time she has to deal with someone else, she'll have renewed resolve. How the girl's parents will like the new forceful self-assured nature of their daughter is hard to predict. James didn't care anyway. James started back for his class since he had nothing better to do, but then the old uneasy feeling came over him and before he arrived at his 'old' class room he found himself in the middle of seventh grade math.. He was again sitting in his seat, his notebook was open in front of him. There were problems on the board and his notes were written in front of him. It was still his handwriting, but not as refined as it was when he was eighteen.

Before he could do anything he felt another tap on his shoulder. He looked behind him to find....

What happens next?
1552112111112.title: Explore the school, and try not to get caught f...

15521121111121.content:
James turned around to see a cute girl behind him, who quickly slipped him a folded up piece of paper. He felt his face get warm briefly as he thought this girl was passing a note directly to him. He wasn't even sure why it embarrassed him, since the girl was probably only 13, like he was now. But before he started blushing too much, she rolled her eyes, and pointed ahead to the boy sitting just in front of James, motioning for him to pass it forward. Now he was really embarrassed at assuming the wrong thing...

He turned back around, and a strand of his medium length shaggy hair fell in his eye. Normally his hair wasn't very short, but it generally wasn't long enough to reach his eyes. Annoyed, he brushed it aside, accidentally banging his elbow on the desk. He thought no one noticed the sound, so he continued on with the note passing. He tapped the boy in front of him on the shoulder, and handed the note to him not so sneakily. The boy turned around, and saw James holding out a note. He was about to grab it, but he took a double take at James. To the boy, he honestly couldn't tell whether James was a boy or a girl at first. He looked like a slightly effeminate boy who had started puberty late, or a very tomboyish girl. Either one was not to his liking, and he thought James was the one giving him the note...

But it was too late, the teacher had watched the whole exchange since James had called attention to himself with the loud noise.

"Mister-... Ms Barrett...? JAMIE, passing notes in my class?!" The teacher yelled, seemingly also unsure what gender James went by. Her confusion only served to cause the class to burst out laughing at him.

"What? I..." James was at a loss for words. As a 13 year old, he really had lost a lot of confidence talking to superiors, and just stammered. On top of that, the constant use of the name 'Jamie' kept tripping him up, and he really wondered why people kept calling him that. It was never a nickname he had gone by as a boy...

"Let me see this note. If it's what I think it is, then detention for both of you." The teacher said, grabbing the note out of the boy's hand. She began to read, with a smirk, "Hey cutie, it's me! Have a date to the dance yet?"

The class's laughter went up to 11 this time, and the teacher didn't even stop them, she got a kick out of it too. But there were three people who weren't laughing, James, the boy, and the girl who wrote the note.

The boy looked furious, "What?! Get away from me you gay little... I don't even know what you are!"

James was red with embarrassment, and didn't know how to react, "But I wasn't... I didn't write that, I was just passing it along!"

The girl who wrote the note behind him chirped up, "No ma'am that's not true I saw Jamie write it just now!"

That was all the teacher needed in order to pass her sentence, "Detention for all three of you. I don't know who wrote it, but you get detention for snitching young lady. And Jamie and Brad, I need you two to go to the Principal right now."

And that was it. James had been in 7th grade for only a few minutes and he'd already had a more embarrassing experience than his entire middle school life as a boy. Nobody seemed to know what gender he was, so everyone presumed the worst in him, and ridiculed him. Or is it 'her' now? He wondered this himself as he sat there frozen under all the laughter of his class. The teacher was losing patience, expecting him to leave for the principal, but he was panicking.

He realized he just couldn't play along with this, anxiety was taking him over, and he needed to get out. Before a panic attack set in, he made an emergency swap. He didn't even know what he did, but suddenly the 13 year old note writing girl was sitting in front of him, where the boy had been, and in place of the teacher was the 13 year old boy, 'Brad' he remembered hearing. That must mean... yes, the teacher was now sitting at the desk behind James.

Brad looked out of place for a second, standing there looking sternly at James and the girl as though they were in trouble, but he couldn't possibly imagine what they were in trouble for.

"Right then… well… cut out the chit chat you three. Now the square root…" Brad went on talking as though he was giving a math lesson.

James realized he must have swapped something to do with their roles, or jobs, or something. But there could be any number of things that he swapped, and he didn't know how to fix it. But the important thing was that his anxiety was starting to finally calm down. He decided to lay low for the rest of the class, until his watch finally went off…
15521121111121.title: 13 Years old, in 7th Grade

choices: 11 years old. Back in grammar school
11 years old. Back in grammar school alternatepath
155211211111211.content:
After a few minutes to calm down, James realized that he couldn't leave a thirteen year old in charge of teaching a seventh grade class. It was plain silly and that might stretch reality to the breaking point. An adult student in the seventh grade just didn't make sense too. Since James didn't know exactly what he had done the best he could do was to simply swap the ages of Brad and the former teacher. It wasn't perfect, but at least it made sense to the casual observed to the classroom. With this done, Brad continued to teach the class and James was going to ride out his time here and wait for the next shift.

James felt another tap on his shoulder. It was the former teacher, James never did get a hold of his name. The teacher wanted to pass a note just like the girl did. The teacher had inherited the girl's crush for, well the girl. But this time, fearing that he would get in trouble again and didn't want to make a scene James refused to take the note. The former teacher gave James an irritated look, but James refused to get involved. He just copied his notes and waited for it all to be over.

As the usual flash happened, James was just relieved to be getting out of there. James was getting second thoughts on this whole adventure, but he couldn't do anything about it until it had ran it's course and he swapped back with that Ben kid. When James returned to full consciousness, he wasn't sitting anymore. he was standing. More than that he was running. It was recess time and he was playing tag with a bunch of kids it would seem. The problem was was that he didn't know which kids were in his game. He knew he was playing tag, since he stopped when the transfer took place and a boy actually tagged him and shouted, "Your It!"
