All things considered, James decided that running around was just the thing he needed to clear his head. The last swap or two had been stressful for him. Now he could run around without worrying about anything. The problem was that this swap happened near the end of the class, after he had finished eating and before the next class was to start. In other words play time. This was unfortunate since he was getting hungry. He supposed swapping ages is hungry work. Not knowing what to do, James just started to run. He assumed anyone who was running away from him must be part of the game. There was also the person who tagged him. he could run after that boy if he couldn't 'tag' anyone else. It didn't matter, at twelve years old in sixth grade he felt energized.

James' strategy worked because two boys in response to the direction that James was running, ran in opposite directions, perpendicular to James. James picked the boy on the left who looked smaller and ran after him. Not sparing any effort, James finally tagged the boy and said "Your It!" The boy didn't tag James back. He supposed that this game had a no retag rule.

It wasn't too much later, before a whistle was sounded and everyone headed back into the building. James looked at his program card and went off to his next class. James assumed this would be his last class in middle school. Next stop for James was grammar school. He would have only two more swaps until he was done. It was at this point that James realized, that He would be stuck in the fourth grade after the last swap for the rest of the day. At least two hours. Only then could he go home.
155211211111211.title: 12 years old, in 6th Grade

choices: Be a good student and follow the other kids back to class.
James becomes a little prankster until the final swap is complete.
1552112111112111.content:
James must have spent longer than he thought running around outside, because before he knew it, he only had a few more minutes until the next age mark. He sat in an English class for a few minutes, finding it hard to focus on anything, partly due to his younger mind having a short attention span now, and the knowledge that anything he learned would be meaningless in a few minutes. Sure enough, it was time.

Soon, his entire world was spinning again, and he knew this would be a far more drastic change than before, as he was changing entire schools. The TSAR was teleporting him to a new place, in a new grade, since he was now young enough to be considered an Elementary School student. The spinning vortex of reality was starting to frighten him, having the maturity of an 11 year old meant that he was having more trouble coping with the paranormal. He closed his eyes and squatted down into the fetal position, holding his knees and hoping it would all stop soon.

His hopes were granted, of course, when the TSAR finally completed adjusting reality. He opened his eyes, and found himself standing in line in a cafeteria. Clearly, it was lunch time wherever he was at, and perfect timing, as James was feeling starved. As he shuffled through the line, he quickly noticed the unusual weight on the back of his head. He was about to shrug it off when he started smelling crappy cafeteria food, but suddenly the weight sharply increased for a second, and he felt pain all over his scalp.

"Oww! What the hell?!" James yelled out in a high pitched childish voice.

He turned around quickly to see what was behind him, and felt the weight shift with the spinning motion, until he was slapped in the face by a long bundle of hair. His own hair. The hair came to a rest over the front of his shoulder, and he saw just why it felt so heavy… It was tied up in a ponytail so long it nearly touched his belly button. It had been bound together by a loose braid and some ties every few inches to keep the hair from flying in all directions, but could easily be undone at the end of the day. This was certainly not any hairstyle he'd ever had in the past, but if he had to have super long hair, he'd rather it be contained like this than flying all over the place.

"Hey, no hair pulling! No pizza for you!" One of the cafeteria workers yelled at someone directly behind James.

"Ugh, you got me in trouble again Jamie, why are you always such an idiot?" The boy snarled.

James caught a glimpse of the boy. He was a snot nosed little brat, with a buzz cut and a little chubby. James felt a sudden vindictiveness to get back at this kid, even though it was something as trivial as a little hair pull. To James, it was violating his personal space, and as an 11 year old, even little things like this created an issue.

"Oh yeah? I got you in trouble? Sure… Just you wait." James mumbled.

He looked around for something to swap, and the first thing that came to mind was the grumpy old lunch lady. Without a second thought, James immediately swapped the old lady's frizzy, dry, mousy brown hair with the boy's buzz cut. He also swapped her aged skin with the start of wrinkles with the boy's youthful skin. She likely wasn't more than 50 years old, but to an 11 year old, that was ancient.

As soon as the swap was complete, James turned back around and yanked on a handful of the boy's frizzy grey hair, and he yelped in pain. A few hairs even came out in James's fist as he let go.

"Not so fun is it? Now leave me alone." James said right to the bully's face, getting a good look at his more wrinkled complexion.

But what James didn't know, was that in his rash swap, he had done the swap so it didn't affect anyone's perception. Most of all, the boy and the lunch lady were both very much aware of their changes. The boy looked around in fear, and tears started to well up in his eyes as he looked at his hands and arms, which were no longer smooth and young looking. At the same time, the old lady felt rejuvenated, with soft, childlike skin, and only a light stubble on her scalp where her hair used to be.

No one suspected little Jamie could be responsible for such a thing, it was a freak accident, or that's what everyone thought. James was able to blend back into the lunch line and finally go find somewhere to sit and eat in peace and quiet… He didn't really notice any potential friends waving to him or anything, so he just sat alone, and ate the crappy food to settle his stomach. Everyone else seemed distracted by the rumor that a kid had suddenly got old for no reason.

As the emotions started to fade, James started to feel like he'd done something wrong. But since he hadn't got caught, he would repress the guilt and pretend like he believed that kid deserved what he got. And besides, they were serving cafeteria pizza today… So that was nice.

--------------

James finally was able to take some time to reflect on what had changed this time. He still wasn't sure what the hair was about, but the TSAR had been making some seemingly random changes so far, as far as he knew. So he shrugged it off as just quirks of the TSAR.

However, what he did find odd were his clothes. They were pretty gender neutral, just a t-shirt, some kid's sized skinny jeans, and a pair of sneakers. But the weird part was that he recognized all these clothes. They were Audrey's! Or at least, they had been clothes she wore two years ago when she was in elementary school.

His sister of course had gender neutral clothes, in addition to more feminine clothes, and these were most definitely hers, he was sure. The tennis shoes were white and dark red with velcro instead of laces. And they definitely looked and felt worn in, since Audrey had worn these previously before she outgrew them. His graphic T-shirt had a picture of Finn and Jake and Marceline from Adventure Time, one of the shows Audrey liked; a show that could be liked equally by boys and girls of all ages.

So clearly since he was now the younger sibling, he was subjected to hand-me-downs from his big sister, which made sense. He would have rather not been wearing skinny jeans, but he had worn them occasionally in his teens, so it wasn't a huge deal.

James sighed, then he looked to his wrist to check the time, and realized… there was no watch there. He checked his other arm, and still no watch. He didn't really have any idea how much time was left until the swap was finally complete, but he knew it had to be any minute now. Lunch was over, and the students were starting to file out back to their classes. He wondered if he should just go wild until the swap was finished!
1552112111112111.title: 11 years old. Back in grammar school

choices: Making swaps with himself in the fourth grade
Making swaps wth his classmates in the fourth grade
15521121111121111.content:
There was a big fuss in the lunch room because of the swap between the lunchroom lady and the boy. The lunchroom lady was in a panic that all her hair had gone. Then when she got a mirror she was in another panic because her face was smooth. Fortunately the bones under her face hadn't change so she didn't look like a kid. People were called and questions were asked. In the end, James' teacher came to retrieve her students. Everyone was escorted back to the classroom except for the boy with the woman's hair. James realized that if he wanted to make another swap he would make sure nobody noticed.

Shortly after being brought to a room that familiar dizziness reappeared and soon he were whisked to another room. He didn't even have time to find out your teacher's name. This was the last change. James were now finally ten years old and in fourth grade. James took stock of himself. He was wearing Jeans and a t-shirt the same as always. The t-shirt had capped sleeves, but that didn't bother him too much. The jeans had a rolled cuff which showed more of his ankle and lower shin that he would have shown as a boy. He was still wearing sneakers but he wasn't wearing any socks which seemed odd to him.

Remembering his long hair he found that his hair was still long, but it was a foot smaller only going down to the middle of his back. Since it wasn't as long as before, it didn't need to be braided to keep it under control. There was an elastic band in his hair which formed it into a pony tail. Since he was sitting, he didn't know how tall he was or what he looked like, but his hands did look small.

This was the final stage. James knew he knew less that before. But he felt fine. He thought he knew everything important he just didn't have the book knowledge one gets from school. What he didn't realize that he didn't know some basic things like what the real differences is between boys and girls. He could tell a boy from a girl naturally, but the differences he couldn't see (those in his underwear) he didn't know. But what he didn't realize were how he had changed emotionally. He was more impulsive now. If he was chasing after a ball, he might forget to look down the street to see if a car was coming. He was quicker to anger and frustration. He could be surrounded by a room of toys and still go to his 'Mommy' and say 'There is nothing to do.' He also had little patience.

James sat in the class for a little while and did his work. He thought to himself, "This is it? This is all that ten year olds do. Big deal." The end of this trip was anti-climatic, not that he knew what that word meant anymore. There was nothing for him to do but to wait for school to be over, go home and swap back his age. He didn't remember that much about being 'an adult' anymore. But he reasoned it must be better than this.

James got antsy in his seat. he didn't want to do the work. he didn't want to sit there. he let his mind wonder. Maybe he could occupy his time by making swaps. he could see what it was like to wear girl's clothes (meaning a dress like one of the girls were wearing.) He could find out what it's like to be the smartest kid in the class. he could find out what it's like to be the tallest kid. How about if he was the teacher. It would be cool with a ten year old teaching. he remembered doing something like that when he was in an older grade. Which grade was it seventh??? Eighth??? He didn't remember. He didn't want to get into any real trouble, since then he could end up in detention and would have to stay longer at the school. This got him to thinking, how would he get home? When this all started he came to school with Lauren, but he wasn't even in the same school as she was now. But he had to do something, he was just so bored.

What does he decide?
15521121111121111.title: Be a good student and follow the other kids bac...

choices: Use the TSAR on the teacher in some way?
155211211111211111.content:
"Jamie?" The teacher called out. He quickly looked towards her, responding to the name. "Jamie, do you know what things a plant needs to grow?"

James thought for a second, and knew for sure this was an easy question. After all, he had taken this class a long time ago, right? At least a few years ago... But he was quickly growing so bored and his mind kept wandering towards using the TSAR again to have some fun. But he knew the teacher wasn't going to stop bothering him.

"Umm, well they need water." James said, a little unsure of himself.

"Yes, that's right! But it's not the only thing, what else do plants need?"

Crap... is that a trick question? What else would it be?

"I... I don't know, love?" He answered, unable to think of anything except one time he remembered his mom telling him plants grow better if you say nice things to them.

The class chuckled, but the other students weren't smart enough to realize how dumb an answer that was, so they were still waiting for the teacher to tell the real answer. She went on to explain basic plant biology, but by then James had completely tuned her out, since she wasn't singling him out anymore.

Instead his attention was laser focused on the girl sitting across the aisle from him. She had long blonde hair, with little cute flowers in it, and she wore a pretty purple dress that went down to her knees. It was very tasteful for school, but James couldn't take his eyes off her. Of course, he was a little too young to be attracted to her in any way, what he was really curious about was the clothes she wore, and her hair. He liked having long hair, but it was so plain and brown, and he didn't know what to do with it other than a ponytail. His wandering 10 year old mind was just curious how she got her hair to look so good. And a small part of him thought girls and their clothes were icky, but he was an adventurous kid, and part of him was curious what it was like to wear clothes like a dress. His logic was, if he thought she looked nice in it, then everyone else would think he looked nice. And if people liked him, then that would be good!

Of course, all that logic went by in a few seconds in his head, as he made an impulsive decision to swap hair and clothes with the girl. This time he remembered what happened in the cafeteria, and ensured no one else saw the change. As a child if he didn't fully concentrate on a swap, his mind was liable to wander and have unintended consequences. Luckily, he was focused this time, and a moment later he had a full head of blonde hair which fell all the way down his back. Around the top of his head was a woven braid of hair like a crown, which tied together in the back. He felt the hair and it was so soft, much better taken care of than his.

While he was so focused on the hair, he almost forgot he was now wearing a pastel purple dress, and a pair of flat shoes and knee high white stockings. In his seat, he looked down and the only skin that was showing was his knee caps, and his whole arms were bare. The dress and stockings covered the rest, yet he still felt free and open. A breeze from the air conditioner prickled his bare thighs under the dress's skirt, and he liked the feeling a little too much. Again, as a 10 year old, James really didn't get that cross dressing was a taboo, even though he still thought of himself as a boy. However, his genitals would still tell a different story.

-----------------------------

After the science lesson was over, James had enjoyed wearing the dress, but had grown bored of it. He spotted a boy in the class wearing something he thought was really cool. He swapped clothes with the boy this time, leaving the boy with the dress, but James wanted to keep the soft blonde hair. Now he looked down and was wearing a black faux-leather coat, on top of a rock band shirt that he had never heard of before, but the logo looked really action packed with lightning bolts going on either side. The pants were just beige cargo pants, and he wore some blue tennis shoes on his feet.

He spent a few moments wearing this, but grew bored even quicker than before. Sure the jacket and lightning bolt shirt made him look really cool he thought, but it wasn't really anything special. The girls clothes were all so much more varied and interesting, he could experiment with them all day and never see the same outfit twice. The boys were just simply... boring to him. In fact, that's what he did. He began swapping different clothes onto himself, mostly the girl's clothes, and even the teacher's clothes one time, each time leaving another student with the wrong clothes. Soon the entire class was wearing the wrong thing, often for the wrong gender, but he was careful not to let anyone become aware. The teacher was actually wearing a pink frilly princess skirt and Frozen T-shirt with Elsa on it, which was one of the outfits James didn't really care for. He liked the feel of the skirt, but the frilly pink just felt like it had too many cooties.

Ultimately James settled on a girl's outfit that he just really liked. The outfit had a short sleeved, beige bolero jacket over a white tank top. And on bottom he wore a pair of short jean shorts which barely went down to mid thigh, and a pair of tan ballet flats. He had no idea about fashion, other than the fact that he thought these all went well together, and he liked how his smooth legs felt when they were not covered up by pants. And the shorts made sure that no one could see his underwear, so it was ideal, he thought!

With his new outfit and hair, he knew he had maybe another hour before he could fiiiinally leave boring old school, so he wondered if maybe he should experiment new instead.
155211211111211111.title: Making swaps with himself in the fourth grade

choices: James gets distracted and forgets all about his troubles
1552112111112111113.content:
Since James was just a kid now and didn't have his watch his perception of time had been changed. He thought that all the clothes swapping took lots of time, at least an hour, maybe more. But in reality it only took maybe fifteen or twenty minutes. James didn't even realize the damage he had done. Not just to the clothing the kids were wearing, but to the apparel the kids owned and wore on a daily basis. In the kids closets at home their entire wardrobes were swapped. Fortunately most of the time, the students swapped clothing with kids of the same gender, but there were a few who were now permanent cross dressers. The teacher's pretty lingerie was gone. She just had the underwear of a little girl now. She didn't even own a bra anymore, not even a training bra. But James was unconcerned about any of this.

One of the students, a little girl had to go to the girlsroom. She raised her hand and told the teacher. In fourth grade, no one goes anywhere alone. So the teacher selected James to accompany the girl. This was perfectly fine with James since he was becoming bored anyway. James was instructed to hold the girls hand as they 'carefully' walked to the girls room.

As the two left the room, James deliberately brought up the girl's clothing. James was fishing for a compliment as to what he was wearing. He felt proud of it, since he had indeed picked it out...sort of. In the middle of this conversation., something totally unexpected happened. The now familiar dizziness which accompanied the age shift happened again. James had thought the boy he had swapped with was ten years old, but he was in fact nine. How was James supposed to know for sure. James now found himself nine-years old and in the third grade. He was back sitting in an unfamiliar class. The girl whose hand he was holding just a second before was gone. The students were different than before and all were 'properly' dressed just like the teacher. His maturity decreased even more than it had. He was more impulsive and more emotional. Even if he was still a boy at this age he could burst out in tears when he didn't get his way. Looking at himself he saw he was still wearing the same outfit as before. Although it was in a slightly smaller size.

James didn't know what went wrong as to why he regressed again. If he had more maturity he would have realized that it was a simple mistake. But at such a young age he started to worry. He thought that maybe he would regress forever. Maybe he would wind up a blubbering baby in diapers. This scared him. There was hope that this might be the last swap or that he would still be old enough to fix things when he got home. But his math skills had been diminished too. He didn't know how old he would be 'at this rate' when the school day ended.

(On a side note, James didn't know that the boy he had swapped with was so young that he couldn't cross the street by himself. This would be a problem when he wanted to switch back since the boy lived on the opposite side of the street.)
1552112111112111113.title: Younger still

choices: James tries to keep it together for the rest of the day.
James resorts to using the TSAR to try to feel better.
15521121111121111131.content:
As James thought more about it, his eyes were quickly starting to well up with tears. He didn't want to keep getting younger, he wanted to grow up! On top of that, he was in a strange new classroom and he had no time to adjust before he simply had a breakdown. As a 9 year old, such a sudden unexpected change threw him into complete panic mode, and all he knew what to do was cry like a girl. He put his head down on his desk and started quietly weeping. His blond hair fell all over him as he cried into his arms.

Of course, this quickly got the attention of the teacher, who looked at him very concerned, "Jamie?" She asked, stopping her lesson and heading towards the crying James, "What's wrong Jamie? Did something happen?"

But James was just a blubbering mess and didn't respond, just kept crying with his head down on the desk. He knew he was making a scene, and wanted to just leave, but he knew it was too late. He hid inside the safe protection of his arms where he couldn't see anyone laughing at his little fit.

"Jamie!" The teacher was starting to get annoyed, "If you're going to be like this, you have to talk to me or I won't know how to help."

"I... I just want to go home. I don't want to turn into a baby. I want to grow up..." James muttered out, not realizing the irony of saying that while crying like a baby.

The teacher simply rolled her eyes, not having any response for that which might help. "Alright just, go sit out in the hall until you calm down, k? Come back to class when you can control yourself."

"Mhm..." James muttered and slowly got out of his seat, shuffling out the door in his ballet flats.

He didn't have the courage to look at any of the other students, but he assumed they were all laughing at how much of a baby he was. He slumped down against the wall outside and sat there practically in the fetal position. One hand clutched a lock of his own hair, the softness of it seemed to help him relax. In about 10 minutes he was completely out of tears, and had a piece of hair curled around one finger, twirling it back and forth.

But to James this 10 minutes felt like a lifetime, and he wondered why school wasn't out yet. All he wanted to do was go home so he could grow up and stop being such a baby. He couldn't remember what age he used to be, but he did remember fragments of his life from this morning. He knew there was this very nice lady named Lauren who was very good to him, but he was too naïve to understand that they used to be dating. He just knew she was a very good friend, and a pretty lady who was all grown up. He wondered if he would be that pretty when he grew up? But deep down he knew he could trust her as much, or more than he could trust mommy and daddy.

He heard the door to the classroom open, and the teacher poked her head out. "Jamie? Are you feeling better yet?"

James wasn't crying anymore, but still shook his head, blonde hair flying to either side as he did so. "I won't be better till I'm a grown up!"

The teacher looked briefly as if she was out of patience, but she held her tongue. She'd seen kids have tantrums over weird things before, so this was nothing new, but she felt a genuine concern for this one.

"Look, do you think you can be ok until it's time to go home? Are your parents going to pick you up?" She knelt down to ask, brushing hair out of his face.

"I dunno… Lauren drove me to school… How am I going to get home? I don't know if she's coming to this school…" James mumbled.

The teacher was at a loss. "Who is this Lauren, you big sister?" When James shook his head, she continued, "Well, I think we need to call your parents. You can't be causing such a scene in my class, it's disruptive! We still have a bit before the day is over, and then we'll call your parents ok?"

James didn't understand what the word disruptive meant, but he felt comforted at the thought of his parents coming, so he simply nodded, and wiped the snot off his nose.
15521121111121111131.title: James panics

choices: James takes the school bus home
155211211111211111312.content:
"You have to act like a big girl until your parents come and get you. Do you think you can do that?" the teacher asked.

"I wish I was a big girl like you," James said.

"You are a big girl,": the teacher said trying to encourage James. "Just hold your head up high and stop crying and all will be alright."

"Miss," James said he didn't know what the teachers name was, "Do you think I can be you for the rest of the day?" James was still sniffling as he asked.

"Sure, if it'll help you can pretend to be strong like me."

"I want to be just like you. I can do it too. But I promise it'll only be until school ends."

"OK, stop crying and you'll be a big girl just like me."

James used the TSAR and swapped himself with the teacher. He was in her body, had all of her knowledge and her maturity. James wasn't crying anymore. But the former teacher turned little girl was scared out of her wits and had renewed (or for her just started) to cry. James knew that now that he was the teacher that he wouldn't get any younger. He could monitor the teacher and see if she got any younger. If she did than he could fix any problem. He was an adult now. If he had slipped into the second grade he might be lost. At least as an adult he could make all things right eventually.

"Listen sweetie," James said in a calm tone. James knew exactly what was going on now, unlike the former teacher. "All will be alright. I promise." The former teacher was scared but she didn't know why. She hadn't any memory of being an adult at all. She was just a little crybaby who was very confused.

"I want to go home," the former teacher said.

"I know you do. You will go home in a very short time. Just come back to class and wait. You don't even have to do your school work for the rest of the day."

"I don't?"

"No, I can see you are upset. Just sit there and wait for the day to end."

"Can I have a lollipop?" The teacher had lollies and pretzels in her desk which she used as special treats when her students did something that deserved one.

"Sure, if you can stop crying. Those are for big girls."

The negotiation had broken the teacher's crying fit and she returned to the room. James followed her. The former teacher waited at the teacher's desk. "You can go back to your seat now," James said.

"But what about my lolly?" she said in a hushed tone. The teacher pointed to where the lollies were. James saw what she was referring to and give her the lolly as promised. The other kids mumbled that they weren't getting any lollies. But one strict look from James at the kids quieted them. The former teacher took James' seat and was quietly sucking on her lolly. James had the teacher's knowledge and could continue the lesson without too much trouble. It was late in the day and so the original teacher had left the easiest most fun lesson for the end to make the time easier to get through. She knew that as the day went on, the children minds would wonder as dreams of returning home flashed through their minds.

The class preceded as normal. James watched the former teacher carefully making sure she didn't get any younger. But that wasn't going to happen.

When the class was over. James personally escorted the former teacher to the office to make sure she would get home. James would swap back as soon as he was sure he would get home safely. He would have personally driven the teacher to his house and then swap back if that was necessary. Getting home was the most important thing.
155211211111211111312.title: James resorts to using the TSAR to try to feel ...

choices: James swaps back into 'Jamie' right away.
James waits to swap back, and stays as an adult for a while longer.
1552112111112111113122.content:
"Yes... she was quite distraught Miss Barrett. She doesn't seem to remember how to get home by school bus... I really think you should come get her." James said to his own mother over the phone, with the voice of the teacher.

Heather, James' mom, agreed to head straight over and pick her child up from school. But James decided to keep the former teacher company while they waited. She was a nervous little 9 year old, and now that James had a mature woman's mind, he thought it was a little silly how much he'd been panicking before. He wondered if it was wise to return to his body.

Of course it's wise... I mean, that's me, I can't just abandon my life. I have to see this through. He thought to himself.

What James didn't realize however, was that for the past hour or so, he'd been thinking of himself as a girl. Despite acquiring the knowledge and memories of this woman, it didn't suddenly give him his old memories back. He was currently still a 9 year old, with the knowledge and maturity of this woman keeping him calm and collected. Through her eyes he saw himself, the 9 year old girl who was still nervous and afraid, with her nice looking outfit that she'd picked out all by herself. Even through this woman's eyes James approved of the outfit, thinking it really suited this girl.

"Look, ma'am I really don't know what happened!" A voice from across the office could be heard, as though there were some heated argument going on.

"What happened is that my son was attacked! Attacked by some sort of black magic witchcraft that was clearly your doing!" It sounded like an angry mother...

James stood up to investigate, and told his body to stay put for just a minute. Around the corner he saw two women and a little fifth grade boy. The boy was the very same who had wrinkly skin and old frizzy hair. One of the women had a buzz cut, and smooth childlike skin. James was instantly reminded of the vindictive swap he'd performed just a few hours ago, when he was a fifth grader. This was the boy that had pulled his hair. However now as a grown woman, James realized how petty and cruel his punishment had been, especially since he'd accidentally made them aware of it in his anger.

"My doing?! I am as much a victim in this as your son!" The cafeteria lady yelled back.

"Oh yeah? Miss youthful skin and hair?! I bet you're trying to use your black magic to stay young and live forever, aren't you?!!" The mother berated the woman.

James knew he had to stop this, it was all his fault anyways. He looked down and saw the TSAR on his adult finger. With a thought, he switched their skin and hair back to normal with each other, and made them unaware of any swap. They all looked around rather confused, with the mother wondering what she was just yelling about. James smiled, relieved to have righted one wrong today at least.

-------------------

When he returned to where Jamie was sitting, he realized she was gone... "Shit, where'd I... where'd she go?"

He searched the nearby hallways, checking in doors, and couldn't find her. His body had run off when he wasn't looking! After a minute or two of searching, he finally went outside to check the parking lot. He stopped in his tracks when he saw a familiar car pulling up, and a little blonde girl running straight to it.

"Mommy!" Jamie called out as she rushed towards the car.

As soon as he saw Heather exit the car, James hesitated. He'd planned on giving the teacher back her body, but he was afraid now. Afraid of descending back into the scary world of being so young and vulnerable. He thought, it would be so easy to just let Heather take little Jamie home and stay in this teacher's life forever. But he didn't want that. It just didn't feel right. She was a good teacher and deserved to have her rightful body back. Besides, he promised the teacher he would swap back when it was time to go home.
1552112111112111113122.title: James' parents pick James up

choices: James find that he is sharing a room with his sister
Follow the immature Miss Raposo as she drives home
15521121111121111131222.content:
By the time James had made up his decision the former teacher in his former body had hopped into the car and drove off. "Darn," he thought. But at least James knew where they were going. James was professionally dressed as a teacher in her body wearing a blouse, slightly tight skirt, sensible heels and pantyhose. This made him look good and professional, but it did make it hard to run. James walked quickly to the parking lot that housed the teacher's cars and looked for the one that 'belonged to him' now. James took out the keys from his purse and pressed the button on the key ring that turned off the alarm of his car. the car alarm chirped off. Following the sound, James found this car. He drove to his former home in the teacher's Honda. When he got there he parked out front.

James' heels clicked as he walked up the driveway. He rang the bell and soon Heather answered the door.

"Hello, may I help you?"

"Hello, I'm Jamie's teacher. I phoned before."

"Yes, Miss Raposo. Jamie speaks of you often." Heather knew the name of Jamie's teacher. James hadn't known what his name was before this moment.

"I was just concerned. Jamie was so upset when I saw her last."

"She seemed fine in the car."

"Did she tell you what was wrong?"

"No, but you know how young children are. Sometimes they get into a state."

"I know indeed."

"But normally Jamie is such a good well behaved student. I was just worried."

"I know she likes you. She says she wants to be a teacher when she grows up."

"I know she will be a great teacher," James said with a smile. "But she scampered away, can I see her to make sure she is alright? I promised her a lolly but she left too quickly."

"Sure," then Heather called inside the house "Jamie, come here!!!"

The former Miss Raposo came down and James showed her the lolly that he had brought for her. When Miss Raposo took her lolly, James swapped their body and knowledge. James was back to being a little girl standing next to his mother.

"What do you say?" Heather asked Jamie.

"Thank you."

"Your welcomed. Then Miss Raposo left to return to her car.

James pulled open the lolly wrapper and stuck the lolly into his mouth. It tasted good. This was the first lolly he had eaten in four or five years. James returned to his room to plan how to progress himself back into an adult (or at least an older teen.) James didn't realize that when he swapped bodies and knowledge back with Miss Raposo that he forgot to also swap back maturity.

What happens next?
15521121111121111131222.title: James waits to swap back, and stays as an adult...

choices: Audrey comes in the room, is she nice or mean to her little sister?
James finishes the homework and gets to work on growing up.
155211211111211111312222.content:
After Miss Raposo left, James finally felt a sense of relief, as though this whole adventure was finally coming to a close. Being at home made him feel safe and confident that everything could finally be brought to a close. He didn't realize that this confidence was actually a result of Miss Raposo's maturity, which was helping him act less childish and focus on the real task at hand. He needed to become a grown-up again. He wasn't even sure why he needed to anymore, since he didn't really remember anything about being a grown-up, but he just knew it was better.

He still had memories of being Miss Raposo for a short time, and remembering how she was able to do so many things like drive a car wherever she wanted, wear nice looking clothing, etc. All of these things were great reasons James thought he needed to grow up, and he was sure there were many more.

"Jamie, hun? Did you need to talk about today? You have a rough day at school, your eyes look red honey..." His mother asked, breaking up his thoughts.

"Oh... well I just had a bad day mom, I'm sorry. I cried in class and the teacher said I made a big scene. I just wanted to be grown-up like her. But I'm ok now!" James said with a genuine smile.

Heather smiled back, and hugged her daughter, "I'm glad to hear that honey. So why were you so upset about growing up? You know you're going to be a beautiful woman when you grow up some day Jamie. You're already a very pretty girl for your age. You shouldn't worry about what grown-up life is like yet, you still have many years to go."

James just shook his head, "No, not many years. I'm going to grow up today! You'll see..."

"If you say so honey... now... did Miss Raposo give you homework today? You can't grow up until you do your homework." Heather told James, half-jokingly. But James believed her. He may have had an adult's maturity keeping him calm, but he still had a 9 year old's gullible intelligence.

"Oh... yeah I did get homework today. Can I go to my room and work on it?" James asked very politely, almost too adult like. It threw Heather off that Jamie was so willing to do homework.

"S-sure! Of course! You know you never have to ask permission for that..."

"Thanks mom!" James said, giving his mom a quick hug, and then running off with his backpack full of papers.

---------------------------

James ran down the hallway, eager to get his homework done. He ran straight to his bedroom door, and opened it. He stood there shocked for a few seconds, as the room was nothing like he imagined...

What... this isn't my room? Why is there all this art stuff and computers? Where's all my toys and games? Where's my clothes?

"Moooom!" James yelled, "What did you do to my bedroom?!"

Heather hurried over to see what was the matter. She laughed when she saw Jamie standing there in her husband's studio, looking very lost. "Umm... sweetie, you know that's your father's work room, right? Come on, let's go to your room."

"Dad has a work room?" James wondered, as his mother took his hand and lead him to the other side of the hall. "But wait... this is Audrey's room."

Heather didn't say a word, but simply opened the door and let James inside. He expected to find all of Audrey's stuff, and there was some of that, but also much of his own stuff as well! Where there was once a double bed, was now a large bunk bed. The closet, which used to be exclusively Audrey's, was now full to bursting with both Audrey's and 'Jamie's clothes.

"Oh wow, I love this room! Look at all the stuff!" James said excitedly, not caring who heard him.

He looked in the closet and saw that someone had attempted to draw a dividing line down the middle, but clothing was spilling over both sides as the two sisters had quite the wardrobes. He could tell what was his by the small size, but he was happy to see that a lot of his clothes resembled the same style that he'd picked out in fourth grade. It of course hadn't initially occurred to him that this was that girl's entire wardrobe, and he'd left that entire class with all the wrong clothes. The mature adult side of him realized that eventually he'd have to go fix some of those swaps, but he knew that they would be fine for now. There were much more important things to do...

"Homework!" James said as he sat down at the vanity desk, and moved aside Audrey's makeup products for room to work.
155211211111211111312222.title: James find that he is sharing a room with his s...

1552112111112111113122222.content:
James worked on his homework. He had to finish up fast so he could return to his plan to become his own age. The problem was he really didn't have a plan. He knew the first step would be to find Jacob. The problem was that even though James' old room overlooked the front of the house and Jacob's house beyond, James now shared a room with Audrey which was across the hall that over looked the back of the house. This was another reason he had to finish fast. James found his homework challenging. Not the least of which because he spent the couple of hours either crying or not paying attention. James had swapped back the knowledge he received from Miss Raposo. James did the best he could, but he didn't know if all his answers were right.

After he was done, he ran out of his room and headed toward the front door.

"Where are you going Jamie," Heather asked.

"I'm going out to play," James replied.

"Not dressed in your good school clothes. Go back to your room and change. Then you can go out and play."

"OK Mommy."

James returned to the room he and Audrey shared. James threw off all his clothes until he was left only in his white cotton panties. He had made a mess leaving all his clothes on the floor. Then he went to look for something to wear. He found a nice pair of jeans that were cuffed at the ankles and had stitching in the shape of a heart on the back pockets. This was find to play in. He also found a nice t-shirt with short sleeves and a picture of Spongebob on the front. He originally wasn't going to wear sneakers, but he reasoned that he would need to wear some sort of shoes since he wanted to go across the street to find Jacob and swap his age back.

Dressed, James was ready to leave, when Audrey came into the room. "Where are you going?" she demanded.

"To play."

"Not until you put your stuff away."

"You aren't mom!"

"No, but this is my room too and you can't leave it this way. Pick up your junk and put it away."

"But I have to...."

"I'm not cleaning up after you! Put it away!"

James was in a hurry and was about to run out when Audrey caught him and prevented him from leaving. At thirteen, Audrey towered over the nine year old James.. Reluctantly, James put away his clothes. Then he made his way again for the front door and the street beyond.

Heather asked again "Where are you going?"

For the third time James said to play. But Heather reminded him that the swing set was in the backyard and that is where she expected him to play. At nine James couldn't go anywhere he wanted. Heather wanted him to play in the back where it was fenced in. Also James wasn't allowed to cross the street by himself. A wise precaution for any nine year old. Defeated, James went into the backyard to think. There he found the swing set and climbed upon one of the swings. He slowly rocked back and forth trying to figure out a plan.

James knew he couldn't go across the street by himself to find Jacob. He also didn't know when he would see Jacob again by accident. Thinking about it a bit, James realized that it didn't have to be Jacob, but anyone his own age would do. The problem was that James didn't know anyone who was eighteen any more. Except for Lauren, James had forgotten all his old friends and classmates. He now had new friends and classmates but they were all pretty much nine years old and in the third grade. James could call Lauren and ash her to come over and then swap with her. But he wasn't sure if she would come, she was now so much older than he was and he didn't want to make Lauren a little girl. It wasn't her fault that James ended up like this, why should she pay the price?

But soon it was time for dinner and then bedtime. James had a bedtime of 7:30 now that he was nine. James tried to protest, but there was no getting around it. James gave up realizing that when this started he saw Jacob in the morning. Maybe he would see him again then. The odds he thought were good. They weren't since Jacob now took earlier classes than James did.

In the morning, James woke up and went through his new morning routine. This included brushing teeth, take a shower and brushing his long pretty hair. Then he put on the clothes that heather had laid out for him. After that he came down to breakfast. Once heather had made sure that James had everything he needed, included money for lunch, Heather escorted James to the stop to wait for the bus. James kept an eye out for Jacob, but he never saw him. The bus arrived and James would have to get on. Then James was going to have a full day of class as a third grader.

What happens next?
1552112111112111113122222.title: James finishes the homework and gets to work on...

choices: James really starts to worry about Miss Raposo, and starts asking questions.
James thinks Miss Raposo is probably fine, and goes through class until recess.
15521121111121111131222221.content:
As his mother left him alone at the school bus, he was tempted to swap with her before she went away, but his maturity made him think twice about that. He had no idea what kind of strange reality changes would happen as a result of becoming his own mom. It wasn't worth the risk, and besides, he had homework to turn in! He knew homework and studying was extremely important.

On the bus, James sat in one of the window seats, and stared out the window as he zoned out. As the bus arrived at its next pickup spot, the rest of the kids filed in, and eventually someone sat next to him. James turned to see a slightly older girl, who was probably a fifth grader. She had dark skin and black hair, and was dressed in a pretty cute outfit, James thought. She wore a pretty cool plaid shirt, and a black skirt with small floral print, with black tights underneath. James decided against swapping clothes with her, when he remembered how much trouble that caused his fourth grade class. Plus he remembered seeing his closet at home, and knew he already had an outfit similar to this somewhere in that closet.

"Hey, your skirt is pretty." James blurted out, wanting to compliment her. He hoped she didn't find it weird.

But she just smiled, "Thanks! And your hair is pretty, I love the braid around the top! I'm Anna, by the way."

James beamed with delight, glad that someone else appreciated the hairstyle he'd picked out for himself. "Thank you, I did it myself! My name's Ja-Jamie, by the way." It wasn't a lie, this morning he discovered he really could braid it all himself, he had that girl's knowledge on hair care, and it was way easier than he expected.

"Cool! Jamie huh? Oh, are you that girl that broke down in tears yesterday? In the third grade class?"

Wow, this girl is really on top of the rumor mill huh? He thought, then said, "Y-yeah, that was me. I don't know what came over me, I was just having a really really bad day."

He expected Anna to be disgusted in his immaturity, but she just patted his shoulder, "It's ok! It happens! It's not easy being cute like us, right? Some days you just have to let it all out!"

James smiled, "Thanks, that's good advice. I really shouldn't worry too much."

"Hey, if I see you at recess today, let's hang out, alright?" Anna asked, as the bus arrived at school.

"Sure thing!" He was happy that a cool older kid was actually willing to hang out with him! For a second he even forgot about his mission that would leave all of this behind anyway. But it still made him feel happy and confident inside.

----------------------------------------------

At class, everyone seemed to be giving James mixed looks. Some kids snickered when they saw him, others didn't really care, and some kids even had a look of pity. But James just ignored them, and tried to follow Anna's advice.

But the class grew restless as the Miss Raposo still hadn't shown up, and class started fifteen minutes ago! Everyone was talking and goofing off, excited that they might be able to go home early if there was no teacher! But suddenly the classroom door opened, and everyone grew silent as a grave. A strange looking woman calmly entered the room, and set some papers down on the teacher's desk. She had jet black hair, pale skin, and darkk makeup around the eyes and mouth. She looked partially like a goth lady, or perhaps someone who was a goth as a teen, and then only half grew out of the phase. Her clothes were mostly black, with a long skirt that went down to her ankles. She didn't look like a wholesome person, but she didn't look mean either. James didn't understand yet, but if he had been older he would have thought she would be a pretty cool person to drink with at parties, and the type of girl to out drink everyone, and dance all night. To a 3rd grader though, she was probably quite scary.

"Hey everyone, I'm Miss Pfeiffer, but you can just call me Kat. I'm your substitute teacher, sorry I'm all they could find on such short notice. Your teacher Miss Raposo never showed up today,and hasn't called in sick yet, so I'm here to fill in last minute. I'm sure she's just fine though, so don't worry. Let's get all the questions out of the way before we begin: No I'm not a witch. Yes I am awesome. No I will not just play movies for you. And yes you will learn something today." She said, in a fairly husky voice, like someone who might drink or smoke a lot, even though she only looked to be in her late 20's.
15521121111121111131222221.title: Substitute in James' class

choices: James swaps back maturity with Miss Raposo
James waiting until the end of the day to swap
155211211111211111312222212.content:
Since there was a substitute, James decided that they wouldn't learn anything that he would be tested on later. Jame's new mature attitude had him worried about what he did to the fourth grade class the day before. He thought it wasn't nice that lots of the students would be wearing the wrong clothes. It didn't matter too much if the students swapped with a member of their own gender, but for those boys who would now be wearing girl's clothing that wouldn't be good. The teacher wearing the clothes of a student was just as bad.

James raised his hand and said he had to go to the bathroom. As was the tradition, the substitute assigned another girl to go with her. Students this young are never left alone to walk the halls. They had to always be in pairs. Miss Pfeiffer asked if there was another student who had to go to the girlsroom too. Soon, James and this other girl were walking through the halls. They had to hold hands as was also the custom. But instead of walking straight to the girlsroom, James walked towards the fourth grade class he was in yesterday.

"But, we are supposed to go straight to the restrooms," the other girl whined.

"This will only take a second. I have to look in on my sister," James lied.

"Oh, alright, but only for a second."

James found the room he was in before and looked inside. James could see the the teacher was obviously in the 'wrong clothes.' She was dressed like a student with a short sleeved blue and white striped t-shirt that said "WHATEVER" on it and denim bermuda shorts. Looking at her feet, James could see sneakers without any socks. Looking through the class, James saw a girl who was wearing a pretty white blouse. He couldn't see the tan skirt or the sensible woman's heels that would clinch that this student had the teacher's apparel. But what the girl did have on was makeup expertly applied. This must be the right girl who had the teacher's style. James swapped them immediately. The girl returned to juvenile clothing befit a fourth grader and the teacher was dressed as at adult.

James looked at some of the boys and saw they were wearing girl's clothing as he expected. He had to make it right. It didn't matter if the girls styles were swapped with other girls and the same for boys, but all girls had to wear girls clothing and all boys had to wear boys clothing. The trick is to figure it out. Because girls can wear unisex clothing, it wasn't always obvious. James swapped responsibilities with the teacher and found himself in front of the class teaching. The teacher was still at the door, when James looked over. But the other girl yanked her away and soon they were gone. James knew that at recess he could walk the halls while his class was eating and return to the third grade by swapping back. If no one was in the class, then they must be at recess too and he could swap there.

Now how to figure out who was in the clothing of the wrong sex. The easiest way to tell is by underwear. If there was a fly in the underwear or a thick waistband then it was boys. But James couldn't see that obviously. So the next thing to check was the obvious things, boys in dresses or skirts. The next thing to check was shoes. Boys should all be wearing sneakers, probably blue or white in color. The girls shoes would be varied. Girls could wear flats, maryjanes, or sneakers that were pink or made of canvas. That should narrow things down. Boys always wore white socks that would be the next indication. Any tights or 'socks' of a different color or had ruffles on them were girl's socks. Finally, look at the shirts. If the student wasn't wearing a t-shirt they were probably wearing girl's apparel. If the shirt had a girly print or was wearing a shirt in a girly color, then it was probably girl's apparel. Lastly if the sleeves were anything except short sleeves, such as cap sleeves, pull sleeves, sleeveless or anything like that it was probably girl's apparel. With this list James walked thought the class, like he was trying to help the students on their work and swapping the boys in obvious girls apparel with girls who were probably wearing boys apparel. It took a while to make sure, but in the end James thought he had it right. Hopefully no boy would leave the class in panties. Of course the one student who was out sick today couldn't be helped.

James taught the class using the teachers knowledge and notes and all went smoothly. Hours passed and lunchtime finally arrived. James escorted the class to the lunchroom and left them with the lunchroom attendant. Then he returned to the third grade class. Miss. Raposo was back. She got up late and didn't want to go to work in the morning. But she convinced herself she had to so she made it to class to relieve the substitute. Miss Raposo would have a meeting with the principal when the day was done.

James saw sitting in his seat the fourth grade teacher. She was sitting up straight while writing lots of notes. James swapped back with her and found himself in his seat. James was proud that he could return all the students to their proper clothes (at least clothes that represented their own gender) and then return to his own class. He felt grown up. This reminded him of the maturity swap he had also don't with Miss. Raposo. James knew he had to swap it back. But should he wait for the end of the day?
155211211111211111312222212.title: James thinks Miss Raposo is probably fine, and ...

choices: Swap ages with Kelsie to be a fifth grader with Anna.
Try to get through the day with no more swaps!
1552112111112111113122222121.content:
Now that James was back in his class, and he'd sorted out every swap that he could remember, there was one thing left to fix. He knew he'd been feeling strange ever since he swapped bodies back with Miss Raposo, almost like he still felt adult-like. And the fact that she was being irresponsible and coming in late to work was almost child-like. Even James' 9 year old intellect could follow that logic, he'd definitely got a part of Miss Raposo's maturity.

I could wait until later but… what happens if something comes up and I'm not able to put things back to normal. No, I need to do it as soon as I can, it's the right thing to do.

After a moment of self-doubt, James let out a deep breath, and swapped maturities with Miss Raposo. He felt something in his head shift, but in a few moments he no longer cared. His thoughts paid no mind to fixing anyone else's problems, because as a child the world revolved around him. And in his world, nothing mattered but the singular goal he focused on, and that was growing up.

"Alright class, that's it for now, time for a recess break and lunch, and then we all meet back here!" Miss Raposo called out, as the kids excitedly lined up to go outside.

James joined along in the excitement, he couldn't wait to get out there and play for a bit, maybe he would even find Anna, that cool fifth grader he met on the bus! The class was led out onto the playground, where other kids from some of the other classes were already playing. Some were climbing on the jungle gym, some were playing tether ball, and some were just sitting around talking or playing their handheld games with eachother.

There were a lot of people James didn't know, of course, since he remembered he didn't belong in this school in the first place. And he was sad that he didn't have a game system to join in with those kids, who were probably battling Pokemon or something.

So instead, James ran over to the grass field where a group of slightly older kids were kicking around a soccer ball. He wanted to join in the game but a part of him hesitated when he thought of how he might dirty up his clothes. Plus he figured they wouldn't let a girl play anyways, and at this point, that's how he was seeing himself, since everyone else saw him that way. However, his spirits were lifted when he noticed there was one girl out there kicking the ball, and it was Anna!

She was still wearing her skirt and black leggings, but it didn't seem to stop her from getting in there and getting rough with the boys, even sliding in the grass. James was in awe, she was like his new idol! The way she moved and darted around between boys with the ball was like she was a real athlete (for a 5th grader at least).

That settled it, James ran in and joined everyone in chasing the ball, trying to keep up with Anna. He found himself quickly running out of breath, and eventually a fifth grade boy knocked into him accidentally, sending James flying off his little feet. He landed on his butt, which hurt, and his eyes began to water slightly.

"Hey! Jamie! You gotta be careful out here, these kids don't hold back." Anna said after kicking the ball away so the group of boys would chase after it. She quickly jogged over to James and reached out a hand to help him up. The water in his eyes quickly subsided before any tears fell.

"T-thanks Anna! Yeah, I'm not that good at soccer, and not as cool as you are out here." James shrugged, looking up at the 11 year old girl who was several inches taller than him.

She put her hand on James' head, ruffling his soft blonde girly hair, "It's alright, you just gotta practice! I didn't get good overnight either."

"Yeah… I guess. And you aren't even dressed for sports, how come?"
Anna simply shrugged, "I dunno, my parents just kinda let me dress how I want, I didn't really plan to get in a soccer match today, but it just happens sometimes. I suppose I should stop before I get grass stains huh? How about we go to the lunch room and get a snack? I'll introduce you to my friends."

---------------------------------

James followed Anna around like a lost puppy after that, heading into the cafeteria. The lunch time and recess time at this school were the same, so long as kids found the time to eat, they could come and go from the recess area as they pleased during lunch.

Anna popped two quarters out of her skirt's tiny pocket, and bought some chewy candy for each of them. James savored the sweetness as they each picked up a tray of food and sat down at a table. James realized there were mostly older kids here, and they seemed to know Anna, possibly friends of hers. But not all of them looked happy to see a third grader at their table.

"What's she doing here? This is the fifth grade table Anna, you know that." A snotty looking pale skinned girl said, giving James a glare.

"This is Jamie, she's cool, don't worry." Anna said, trying to stick up for James.

But the snotty girl was having none of it, "Uhuh, Jamie… Right, I'm sure she's cool. Just don't make any sudden moves, she might wet her pants and run out crying."

"Kelsie!" Anna yelled, trying to stick up for James.

An angry tantrum was about to come over immature young James, "I did not wet my pants! I was just upset ok! It can happen to anyone!"

The 'Kelsie' girl, just laughed at James' outburst. "Jamie, your mom dresses you right? If she didn't I'm sure you'd be wearing yellow pants to hide the pee stains."

"I dressed myself, thank you!" James blurted out.
1552112111112111113122222121.title: James swaps back maturity with Miss Raposo

choices: James immaturity gets him minto troiuble
15521121111121111131222221213.content:
James was mad at Kelsie. It wasn't right for Kelsie to treat him like this. James just wanted to make it through a difficult day and go home and get his life back. Anna was nice and if all the kids were as nice as Anna, James might not mind staying a little girl for a while longer, but Kelsie was just plain mean. If James hadn't given up his adult maturity back to Miss Raposo then she wouldn't have gotten so mad, but that was water under the bridge.

James wanted to make Kelsie pay. But making her pay wasn't enough, Kelsie had to know that she was being punished. Kelsie joked about James dressing himself so that would be the first thing that he changed in Kelsie. James looked for the youngest girl she could find, a first grader or a kindergartener. There weren't any kindergarteners since they only went to school for half a day and so they didn't have recess. But there were a few first graders. James found one and swapped the apparel of the little girl with Kelsie.

"Kelsie, you should talk, did you pick out what you are wearing?" Kelsie was now wearing a Minnie Mouse tank with matching shorts which looked awfully cute, but still juvenile for a fifth grader. Kelsie looked at what she was wearing and was horrified. She hadn't put on anything like this this morning.

"It's ummmm..." Kelsie said lost for words.

"Did you pick it out or did your MOMMY choose it for you?" James continued emphasizing the work Mommy. Kelsie now remembered that her 'mommy' did pick all her clothing. But Kelsie knew that shouldn't be right. She knew she was old enough to dress herself, but she doesn't.

Continuing, "But I guess you need someone to dress yourself, since you are as tall as a kindergartener." James swapped Kelsie's height with a first grader, but the insult worked better the other way. Regardless, Kelsie was now much shorter than James now after losing several inches.

"You did this to me!!!" Kelsie screamed.

"Did what? It's not my fault you are the size of a baby." James was exaggerating again. Kelsie had lost a lot of height, but she wasn't a baby. She hadn't gotten any younger either. She was on the verge of puberty and that hadn't changed. Her chest was a little puffy as breasts were about to develop. Actually Kelsie was very lucky, because if James didn't change her back and he wasn't planning on it, at least she hadn't started her growth spurt. If she had, then Kelsie might be considered a 'little person' instead of just short when puberty was done..

"Anna, you saw what she did to me, didn't you?" But Anna thought that Kelsie had always been this short and her style was juvenile. Anna didn't notice anything wrong.

"She hasn't done anything to you, she hasn't left her seat," Anna told her.

"She made me short."

"Short???"

"Yes."

"And she made me Queen of the school," Anna mocked

Kelsie ran away looking for an adult. But no one in the school or anyplace else thought anything was wrong. Kelsie had alays been a short girl. That's just the facts.

What happens next?
15521121111121111131222221213.title: James gets mad at Kelsie

choices: Jamie is now 11, and helps keep the bully off Kelsie until a teacher gets there.
The bully was held back in grade, and was actually older than 11.
155211211111211111312222212133.content:
After Kelsie ran off, James noticed one of the girls who was sitting next to Kelsie was not happy. "I can't believe you would go after her height and clothes, that's just rude. I hope you know that her mom treats her that way because of her height and she's really insecure about it."

"Come on, Rachel, at the end of the day Kelsie's still old enough to get over it," Anna said with a shrug, she clearly wasn't that offended by any of it. "And you have to admit, she was being a bitch."

"And at the end of the day Anna, your friend here is still a third grader who was also being mean. She doesn't belong here, she's causing trouble. Kids her age just aren't ready to grow-up yet." Rachel said.

"I am too ready!" James blurted out, rather immaturely.

"No, no you're not."

Anna sighed loudly, "Racheellll, come on. Why are you like this? I am here just trying to be nice to the poor girl since she had a bad day and you gotta bring her down like this."

"Because Anna, you are always doing this! You always bring kids to this table who all they want to do is be friends with the cool kids, well they AREN'T cool ok? Yeah I get it, you want to be all nice and happy, but this table has rules you know, and you have to ask the rest of us before you do stuff like this! First she upsets Kelsie, now you're sticking up for her? What's next, she's going to be your new bff? Who's with me?" Rachel asked the rest of the girls and a few boys at the table.

However most of them just shrugged, not really caring. One of them shrugged, "I dunno, I don't think Jamie did anything that bad, she seems like, whatever."

"Yeah Rach, why don't you chill out, and go find Kelsie before she gets into trouble?" One of the boys told her.

Anna sighed, "Yeah really, calm down girl. If we could make Jamie a fifth grader we would, but it doesn't work that way."

Rachel stood up and saw Kelsie on the other side of the cafeteria, "Hey, what the heck?"

James watched as Rachel ran past random other students towards Kelsie. There seemed to be a rather large boy pushing her around. He was tall, and probably another fifth grader. Even at 9 years old, James felt a tiny amount of guilt for making Kelsie so small and vulnerable. He sighed and hurried off after her, dodging students with trays of food as he ran.

"Leave her alone!" Rachel said to the boy, trying to hold on to his arm as he was about to push Kelsie again into a wall. But the kid was big and heavy, and Rachel didn't have any strength to stop him.

When James caught up, he saw the boy turn around and now he was angry at Rachel too, and pushed her away, though it took more effort than it did with Kelsie's first grade body height. James wondered where the teachers were and why no one had come to break this up yet, but they were just around the corner of a wall, and teachers hadn't yet heard anyone over the loud roar of the cafeteria. A few kids had started to crowd around, but James pushed past and got inside. He was only 9 however, and the kid immediately blocked James from getting any closer, seemingly having some beef with Kelsie in particular.

"Stay out of this!" The boy said, looking back to Kelsie like he might actually hit her!

Ugh… if I was grown-up I could stop this… If I was cool like Anna I could do anything!

That was when James knew what to do, he focused on the TSAR and swapped his own age with the bully. Reality started to shift again...

James grew up a couple of inches. He also didn't notice that his breasts started to get a little puffy as he was on the precipice of female puberty. The one thing that did change was that under Jame's shirt, he was now wearing a training bra which didn't have any true cups. James was happy that Rachel could handle it, since he didn't want to get too involved himself. Kelsie had hurt James' feelings. That didn't mean she would be hurt but a bully who towered over her now. James was still very hurt by what Kelsie said about letting him stay with his new friend Anna.

James was no longer a 'little third grader,' he was a fifth grader like the rest of Anna's group and fit right in. The whole argument that Kelsie had had with Anna was erased from history. Or at least from the minds of everyone involved except Kelsie and James.

"No, I've got to get out of here. Things are happening. Weird things." Kelsie was legitimately scared.

"Don't be silly. Everything is fine," Rachel soothed.

"OH My God, It has happened to you too Rachel."

"look at yourself, you are a boy."

"I've always been a boy," Rachel said insulted.

"No you are a girl."

"Who you calling a girl. I help you out and you call me names."

As Kelsie was running out, you approached Rachel. "Why is she running? She looks like she saw a ghost?" James said with mock concern.

"I don't know, she is acting crazy. She said I was a boy," Rachel told him.

"Maybe she needs a head doctor?"

"Maybe...Let's return to the table."

15521121111121111131222221213312.content:
Kelsie ran out of the building and walked around the yard. She looked closely at things to see if anything had changed. Everything seemed normal except for herself. She was shorter. Very much shorter. She didn't know how this could be. At the height of a first grader, everyone seemed taller than she was. But when she talked to anyone she knew, they said she had always been this short. Was that true? What she always this short. Kelsie knew people got taller, but was it possible for people to get smaller? She didn't think so. She tried to convince herself that she was always this short. It didn't make sense, but it made more sense than she had shrunk. Especially since what she was wearing was so childish. She liked Minnie Mouse, but what she wore seemed too juvenile for herself.

Soon recess was over and all the children were ushered back to their room. James shared a classroom with Anna and Kelsie. James was still livid at what Kelsie tried to do. James really liked Anna and he didn't want anyone to get in the middle of that relationship. James decided Kelsie hadn't paid enough. James was going to use the TSAR to play a trick on her.

The class started up. The teacher, Mrs. Dietz was picking up from where the class left off before lunch. "Who can answer the first question?" Mrs. Dietz asked. A bunch of students raised their hands. Mrs. Dietz selected one. You swapped Kelsie's name with the boy who was selected. "Kelsie, what is the answer?" Mrs. Dietz inquired.

"The answer is 26," the boy whose name was now Kelsie said. Kelsie hadn't raised her hand. But her name was called and a boy answered it. But that boy's name is Xavier. Then she realized that that wasn't the boys name that was her name. But how can it be, she thought her name should be Kelsie, but it was Xavier.

The teacher moved onto the second question and asked for more volunteers to tell the answer. This time she selected a girl. "Yes, Kelsie," Mrs. Dietz said as she acknowledged another student.

"I think it is 67." the new Kelsie said. Xavier's name had been returned to him. Now Kelsie thought her name was Tamika. Kelsie remembered that she had thought her name was Xavier just a moment ago, but it still should be Kelsie and she thought her name had always been Tamika too. How is this possible.

For every question, the student always chosen was named 'Kelsie' and Kelsie thought her name was that of the student. Even when her friend Anna answered a question. Soon, Kelsie remembered having six names. Finally, Kelsie decided to raise her hand. When the teacher acknowledged her, her name was like everyone else's 'Kelsie.' The problem was Kelsie had been so distracted by what was going on she didn't know the answer at all which was very embarrassing. Another two questions were answered, by students named Kelsie of course and then the teacher moved to another lesson. Kelsie's name had returned to herself and she tried to convince herself that everyone was playing a mean trick on her.

A little while later, Kelsie was back to herself. At least the shorter version of herself. She was so happy and relieved until she looked across the room and saw herself sitting there. Her body had been swapped again. But this time when she looked at herself her body had returned. Looking again at the boy who had been sitting there was back to normal. Then she looked again and she saw herself again in a different seat. Then she moved across the room and saw herself again in a different seat. Every time she looked at herself her body was normal, but when she looked at the students one of them had her body. It was a different one every time.

Kelsie was totally confused. Things got worse when she saw herself teaching the class. Her body had been swapped with the teacher. She now had the teacher's body. Her clothing had adjusted to fit the new body, but her boobs sagged since she wasn't wearing a bra. No one seemed to notice that anything was wrong, just like no one noticed when everyone was named Kelsie. The students for this lesson were put into small groups and the teacher who had the shortened body of a fifth grader walked around the class as if everything was normal. Kelsie asked the students if they noticed anything wrong but even though she now towered over them, no one thought that anything was wrong. Although even children could tell that Kelsie was really starting to panic. She knew something was wrong but she couldn't convince anyone. Kelsie used all her will power to not cry although she wanted to.

Kelsie couldn't take it anymore She had to get out of the room. She raised her hand and the teacher acknowledged her. Her name was still Kelsie she was glad of that. "Mrs. Dietz, I have to go to the bathroom," she asked.

"OK, take the pass and you may go. Fifth graders were old enough to go to the girlsroom alone." Kelsie got up and walked to the teacher's desk, picked up the pass and headed toward the door. before she got there she found herself sitting and another girl was continuing her journey out the door and presumably to the girlsroom.

Kelsie raised her hand again. "I have to go really bad," she said.

"OK," Mrs Dietz said, "as soon as Candice comes back. You may go."

Nothing happened while Candice was out. But soon, Candice was back and when Kelsie took the pass again, she found herself in Thomas' seat. Thomas was about to leave the room on the way to the boysroom.

Kelsie couldn't stand the strain and started to cry.

What happens next?

155211211111211111312222212133122.content:
Kelsie began to cry and closed her eyes, hoping it would all go away. She was afraid she was going crazy, and none of this could possibly be real. When she opened her tear soaked eyes, she was somewhere else in the classroom once again, but now she could see the whole class from a different perspective. She was standing up near the front of the room where the teachers usually stand. She still had the mature body of Mrs Dietz, and was now even dressed in her clothes, including a skirt and heels.

"Mrs Dietz... are you ok?" Anna asked quietly, seeming very concerned for her teacher. A few of the other students mumbled to eachother, not sure what to do with the teacher in tears.

The body of Mrs Dietz slowly started walking towards her desk, stumbling in her heels as she walked, as though she'd never worn anything like that before. She avoided eye contact with the class, and just sat down as soon as she was able. She buried her face in her arms, and a muffled weeping could be heard. James slowly started to realize that maybe he'd gone too far. This girl had absolutely learned her lesson, if there was any lesson to be learned here anymore. He stood up and walked towards the teacher's desk.

"Mrs Dietz... are you ok?" James muttered, trying to lean in close. There was no response, so he continued, "Should you... you should go take a break, ok? We'll stay in the class."

The murmuring amongst the classmates continued, but no one dared speak up. Suddenly Mrs Dietz just nodded, and slowly headed out the door, leaving the classroom. James poked his head outside to see her leaning against the wall crying some more. He saw Thomas walking back from the bathroom, but he stopped in his tracks seeing the teacher in tears.

"Oh crap, what'd I miss...?" Thomas asked.

"Don't worry, she just needs a minute..." James said, holding the door open for Thomas.

When Thomas was finally at his seat, James decided to swap Kelsie back to her own body again, and leave her alone from now on. James quickly hurried back to his seat just as Kelsie realized she was once again at her desk. Mrs Dietz stayed outside of the classroom for a few more minutes, fixing her makeup from all the tears, and wondering just what she was crying about in the first place. Once everything was fixed, she entered the classroom expecting the kids to all be out of control in her absence, but they were mostly quiet. She smiled and tried to pick up the lesson where she left off, but the class seemed very subdued and helpful from that point on.

James stopped using the TSAR and the rest of the school day moved along quickly. Kelsie tried to convince herself that nothing had happened. The longer that went on without Kelsie experiencing anything bizarre made it easier for her to believe it was all in her mind. This was until she realized that sitting in her seat that her feet could barely touch the ground which would upset her again.

James and Anna sat together in the bus on the way home. He liked Anna a lot. Not only was she nice, she was really cool. When he was about to get off the bus, Anna who lived about two blocks away said that she would come to his house to play. She said she would be there at about 4:00 after she finished her homework. James was looking forward to showing Anna his room and playing with her. James hoped that Audrey wouldn't be much of a pain while Anna was there.

James got off the bus and it drove away. Heather was waiting for him at the bus stop. James told his mom about his day at school and that he made a new friend. James was very excited that Anna would be coming over soon. But before James entered his house he caught sight of across the street. There he was, Jacob about to leave his own walkway for god knows where. This was James' opportunity to swap his age back. But then he remembered that Anna was coming over.

What happens next?
